You and your peers are to be "shaped up to accompany the elite of society". You've been told you'll get assigned an Emperor's Title at one point, but most of your breathtakingly beautiful classmates already have one. In the meanwhile, maybe you can get closer to one of them...?

name: Ruinwaker
summary: A Sci-Fi action adventure VR Game. Play in singleplayer exploring the story of a lost ancient power, or fight alongside friends in Co-op missions! Want something faster paced? Try PVP Multiplayer across diverse maps from different worlds!

name: Ruptured
summary: Ruptured is a metroidvania where the world is split in two. Rupture between the two similar but slightly different dimensions to navigate your way to the source. Discover what broke this world.

name: Rumple Town
summary: Rumple Town is a card drafting game, that involves defending a town that is populated by beans. Recruit beans to protect your town, and attacks the invading monsters. Can you and your town survive?

name: Runbow: Satura's Space Adventure
summary: A new poster has been revealed over the horizon of Poster District! Get Satura's Space Adventure to find out what mysteries await Hue, Val, and Satura!

name: Ruins of Istanbul
summary: Ruins of Istanbul: A Tale of Curse is a VR Action Horror-shooter game. In post-apocalyptic Istanbul ruins, you have to stay calm, check your ammo and survive. With easy to play but hard to master mechanics, you will get carried away in Turkey!

name: Runner2: Good Friends Character Pack
summary: In most instances, “DLC” stands for “downloadable content.” With the Good Friends Character Pack, however, it stands for “Downright Lovable Characters.” Featuring the likes of Josef (Machinarium), Spelunky Guy (Spelunky), Raz (Psychonauts), Dr. Fetus (Super Meat Boy), Quote (Cave Story), Atlas (Portal 2), and Invisible CommanderVideo (duh), it’s a virtual tour de force of indelible indie awesomeness. It’ll run you (pun intended) about as much as a cup of coffee, and is scientifically proven to give you an energy boost equivalent to about eight pounds of espresso beans. Your heart might start beating dangerously fast, but your eyes and ears (and maybe even your nose - why not?) will most definitely thank you.

name: Ruler of the Waves 1916
summary: Ruler of the Waves 1916 is a naval combat game and turret-based shooter. The game follows, in a fictional sense, the major battlecruiser engagements in WWI. The player must utilize multiple turrets on multiple ships to maximize their firepower.

name: Run to Infinity
summary:
Run To Infinity is a so-called endless runner, where you have to get as far as possible while collecting as many coins as possible. How far can you make it?
In Toth Games' second series of games, it's all about getting as far as possible. This series of games will again be published in German, English and Swiss German.
Have fun running!

name: Run-A-Whale
summary: Are you ready to dive into the world of Run-A-Whale? So ride your whale in an endless adventure! Tap to dive and release to jump, avoid obstacles, collect coins and try to go as far as you can. Control your whale in 3 different styles: swim, slide and fly. Progress through 90 goals and face different bosses in epic battles!

name: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
summary: Join in all the Reindeer Games in this adaptation of the classic claymation holiday story.

name: Rune Tales: The Citadel
summary:
The Citadel, the first chapter of a story called Rune Tales, is a multiplayer cooperative game played with individual pods.
Two to four players participate in the experience, which lasts between 20 and 25 minutes. Immersed in a world of magic, they form a team and must face hordes of enemies, mainly orcs and goblins.

As they progress through the level, players can earn magical weapons and equipment to be ready to face the final boss. Different variations of the game will be offered to players, depending on their level.

name: Running Pops
summary:
Running Pops is an addicting play to earn game designed by GameHype JSC. The goal is to as far as you can, do not be caught by Mr Right, so you can reach the top 10 scorers.

Every top 10 scorers of each map will get cash prizes by the end of the edition tournament time.

You play the role of a Pop (Icecream) with skillful flying, dodge, and run away from the pursuit of an angry policeman.

Obstacles that stop you on the way are very familiar things like a running train, a train suddenly appearing from somewhere, the horizontal bars that seem to be unable to hold you back but bring surprises. unbelievable.

Many versions of the game are coming out with new maps, new missions with stunning graphics that fans can't help but explore.

name: Rune Tales : Underground
summary:
"Rune Tales – Underground" is a cooperative game that is played in individual pods of 2 to 6 players. The story follows the previous opus, Rune Tales : The Citadel, but the game has been designed to be understandable and playable by all players, whether they have experienced the first installment or not.

Here, players find themselves besieged in the catacombs of the City and must find a way out to escape. But it’s without counting on the terrible mage in search of a strange forgotten treasure, who corrupts the creatures of the depths and raises the dead… Along the way, players may encounter the characters of Lug and Dunum, or discover the twists and turns of the Rousse-Croix... A rich immersion in historical references that should delight fans of the capital of Gaule.

name: Run to Infinity: Easy Mode
summary:
Run To Infinity is a so-called endless runner, where you have to get as far as possible while collecting as many coins as possible. How far can you make it?
In Toth Games' second series of games, it's all about getting as far as possible. This series of games will again be published in German, English and Swiss German.
Have fun running!

name: Rush Legends
summary: Rush Legends is an online multiplayer First Person Shooter game with parkour mechanics where players can select a hero and utilize their unique abilities to be the last one standing.

name: Running MrBeast
summary: MrBeast will you help the little piggy to survive through its journey and save your fortune from stealing?

name: Run to Infinity: Hard Mode
summary:
Run To Infinity is a so-called endless runner, where you have to get as far as possible while collecting as many coins as possible. How far can you make it?
In Toth Games' second series of games, it's all about getting as far as possible. This series of games will again be published in German, English and Swiss German.
Have fun running!

name: Run to Infinity: Impossible Mode
summary:
Run To Infinity is a so-called endless runner, where you have to get as far as possible while collecting as many coins as possible. How far can you make it?
In Toth Games' second series of games, it's all about getting as far as possible. This series of games will again be published in German, English and Swiss German.
Have fun running!

name: Rumbleverse: Holiday Demon Pack
summary: It's that time of year again! Celebrate the Festival of Fights, Grapital City style! The Rumbleverse Holiday Demon pack includes the Holiday Demon set & 1,000 Brawlla Bills.

name: Rubber Bandits: Supporter Pack
summary:
The Supporter Pack is a collection of characters made from almost pure gold and an extremely rare unicorn.
Buying this is a way for you to show your support for the game and the devs.
- 4 golden characters exclusive to the supporter pack. This is your way of showing what a generous person you are.
- 1 Unicorn.

name: Ruck
summary: Reach to the top of the tower to get a strange golden artifact. But be careful, because the tower is filled with a lot of enemies and diferrents traps.

name: Run on the Beat
summary: Let's overcome with music! Jump to the beat and earn coins!

name: Rush Galaxy
summary:
Fearless warriors, wear your helmet, set foot on your ship, and go toward the deepest of your universe! The only thing you need is speed.
Do you want to drive the super speed of the spaceship in the vastness of the galaxy? Do you want to experience the thrill of the shuttle in a messy meteorites? Do you want to challenge your reaction speed and limitation? So, you can't miss this game - Rush Galaxy.

name: Rugby Hero
summary: Kickoff the Rugby World Cup 2015 with infinite ‘TRY’ scoring fun and win Glory with your favorite team. Be the famous player of your heroic team and have fun running past defenders this Rugby season. Show off your skills by running hard to fend off endless tackles and Score the highest to celebrate victories.

name: Ruina: Haito no Monogatari
summary: In a quiet corner of a small town by the river, ancient ruins have mysteriously reappeared. Within lies a sprawling labyrinth filled with cryptic prophecies that have drawn in adventurers from far and wide. But alongside the legendary monsters and treasures, many more secrets remain hidden...

name: Running Robot Man 4
summary: Parasail over lava, shoot monsters with your laser, and explore procedurally generated dungeons with your friends. An action-adventure roguelike made in Unreal Engine.

name: Russian Train Trip 2
summary: Journey on a passenger train in Russia. You play as a first-person character, you have to travel by train for 7 days to Vladivostok. Look out the window, listen to the radio, and move around the carriage.

name: Ruined Kingdom
summary: Ruined Kingdom is a real-time strategy, RPG, and route attack game. Defeat the insolent humans and take from them whatever your heart desires, CONTROL the battlefield, Defeat rival tribes! Take control of an army of Orcs fighting to conquer! Win and gain experience to unlock new upgrades.

name: Rune It Out
summary: Short Description: Rune it Out is a multiplayer PVP game where you and your fellow RuneMages combine runes into spells to blast each other. One wrong incantation and you'll blast. Don't blow it

name: Rune Monsters
summary: A monster collector RPG that features over 100 monsters of 18 different types.

name: Rusher Dominance
summary:
Tired of everyday traffic, waiting for the green light at every corner or having to ease off the gas on each turn? Then you desperately need a dose of Rusher Dominance!
Rusher Dominance defines a new concept in street racing. No complex interfaces or long tutorials teaching you how to drive; Rusher is simple to use. Take the device in your hands and try to tame these speed demons! We offer unstoppable fun.

name: Rune Factory 4 Special: Another Episode Pack
summary: This downloadable content adds illustrated stories for all 12 marriage candidates, fully voiced in English and Japanese. View them by selecting Another Episode from the title menu.

name: Rune Gems
summary: Rune Gems is a new & unique puzzle game.

name: Rumble Sus
summary: Rumble Sus is a fast-paced social deduction party game. Players learn their identity at the beginning by whether or not their controller is rumbling without others knowing. Once the game starts, the Traitors need to find teammates and try to defeat all the Innocents without being exposed. Meanwhile, the Innocents need to utilize items on the map and their wit to find dubious players and defeat all the Traitors. Pick up your controller and have a chaotic game full of laughter and suspicion with your friends!

name: Ruslicstan Invades
summary: Save Europe from shortage of crappers! The swamp horde of ruslic savages is gushing out, again! Stop the "russian world" leakage from the crapper-state, in the meaty first-person shooter game!

name: Rubblar
summary: Time to grab everything you can!

name: Runa & the Chaikurú Legacy
summary: Help the brave adventurer Runa uncover the mysteries buried deep in the Ruins of the ancient Chaikurú civilization, in a classic and epic 3D action-adventure game. Explore a fantasy world inspired by South-American locations, nature and cultures.

name: Run Gun ZR
summary: A new take on the Infinite Runner, now in VR. Dodge, Jump, and Vault with both hands as you make your way through infinite obstacles and Zombies. Unlock more weapons to help you progress further. How far will you go?

name: Russian Roulette
summary:
It’s a battle of wits in this Soviet mind game!

The rule of the game is simple: plug in your Nintendo Zapper Lightgun, pull the trigger… and pray. Two players, six chambers, one bullet. See who comes out alive. Try a higher difficulty for a more risky challenge. Square off against another player or play against the CPU. Still up to the challenge? Then you’d better be lucky. Otherwise it’s lights out in this thrilling Nintendo Light Gun game!

name: Run-Gunners' Revenge
summary: Run-Gunners’ Revenge is a 3rd/1st person, retro inspired, action platformer shooter, Where you, REX, last survivor of the elite legendary Run-Gunners, enact revenge against a tyrannical occupying force, by blasting and platforming your way through hordes of formidable enemies.

name: Rusp
summary: Why play any other boring Shooter When you can Rusp! Rusp is the new Fast Paced Movement Shooter that you were waiting for.

name: Running Riot
summary: Pick a class and blast your way through rooms of cyber enemies in this roguelite twin-stick shooter! Choose your abilities and your path wisely, because you've only got one life to make it through the gauntlet. Rack up those points and spend them on even more ways to RIOT!

name: Rugby Sevens 23
summary: Get ready to experience the intensity and excitement of rugby 7s like never before with our new game! In this retro-inspired 2D action game, you'll take on the role of a rugby player and lead your team to victory in a full career mode, complete with team building, trading of players, and more.

name: Runescape
summary: A port of Runescape for the cancelled Panasonic Jungle handheld.

name: Rugby 25
summary: Welcome to the ultimate rugby gaming experience, Rugby 25! Whether you're a passionate fan or a newcomer to the world of rugby, Rugby 25 immerses you in the heart of the action and hard-hitting tackles like no rugby video game has before. From humble local club matches to the bright lights of the world's greatest international tournaments, every detail has been meticulously crafted to bring the excitement and intensity of the sport to your fingertips. Rugby 25: where legends are born, and history is made.

name: RubPix
summary: Rubpix is a picture-forming sliding block puzzle game from the creator of Pretentious Game.

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Limited Edition
summary: The Limited Edition, avaliable only in Europe, includes a 140-page A5 notebook, character stickers, Micah themed pin badges, a woven patch, an A3 poster, plus access to the in-game “Swimsuit Mode” allowing for characters to appear in their swimsuits year-round, all housed in a custom outer box featuring an original Rune Factory 3 Special illustration inspired by the game’s anime opening.

name: Rumble Heroes
summary:
The sole princess of the kingdom was kidnapped by the dark knights!
Your heroes are the only hope.

In order to save the princess, you need to start with reconstructing the village.
Collect trees, mine ore, and construct buildings to improve the village.
Furthermore, you can recruit new heroes at the pub.
Recruit and raise legendary heroes that use various skills!
Discover treasure and obtain various monsters and resources through huge open areas.
Hundreds of monsters appear in the dungeon.
But don't worry! The heroes you trained can wipe out the monsters!
Now, forget about the collectible RPGs that are complicated and full of manual, time consuming grinding.
You can move several heroes with just one hand.
Jump into the fun, fast paced hack-and-slash combat with simple controls!

name: Rush Rally
summary: Realistic yet fun car physics programmed from real car telemetry! Experience rallying at its best, drift and kick up endless amounts of dust and snow!

name: Running Guys
summary: A police officer, a thief, and a bag full of cash, with a hole in it. This is the story of a wild pursuit on this 2D platformer.

name: Run On Home
summary: A short horror/comedy themed 2.5D platformer with puzzles, hostile enemies, and multiple endings. After reaching the end the first time you'll unlock the demon killing gun.

name: Run, Jesus Run!
summary: You have 10 seconds to redeem the humanity.

name: Rummikub
summary: Now it's time to play Rummikub free online against real players or AI. The basic goal of the tile-matching game is to create melds of number tiles in your hand. You get 14 tiles at the game start, and have to create groups or runs on your turn. A group is a combination of three or four tiles with the same face value, but of different color, such as blue 8 + red 8 + back 8. A run is a sequence of numbers of the same color, e.g. red 2, 3, 4 and 5. On your turn, you get a tile and have to create melts using the tiles on the table, and the initial has to score at least 30 points. This online board game requires matching and strategy skills, and is fun for kids and adults to play.

name: RushLane
summary: Welcome to RushLane, an adrenaline-pumping, high-speed racing game set on the scenic forest roads! Take control of your car and navigate through the twists and turns while avoiding oncoming traffic and collecting points to unlock new vehicles.

name: Rumbleverse: Season Two
summary: Rumbleverse Season Two is live! The bridge is open, and the champions of Grapital City are battling it out at the all-new sunny sites of Low Key Key.

name: Rune Worth: Kokui no Kikoushi
summary: A 1990 RPG by T&E Soft.

name: Rune Coliseum
summary: A deck-building roguelike game with unique semi-real-time combat system. Step into the shoes of an ancient gladiator and do your best to survive in the coliseum. Combine various skills and equipment, develop your own fighting style, and defeat all the enemies to become the next champion!

name: Run Penguin Run
summary: Run Penguin Run is an exciting running game where you take control of an adorable penguin and navigate through various obstacles and challenges. The game is designed to be easy to learn and features simple controls, including jumping, sliding, and attacking.

name: Rust and Resolve
summary: Embark on a quest to navigate the tricky and unforgiving environment in an attempt to return home.

name: Rubber Royale
summary: Rubber Royale is a silly, high-energy 3rd person ragdoll shooter/brawler with destructible arenas and various game modes. 16 players compete to become the top player! Join now for non-stop action and let the madness begin!

name: Rudra: A Tale of Time
summary: Rudra: A Tale of Time is an action RPG inspired by Hindu scriptures. Embark on a journey of self-discovery by unlocking chakras and using mantras to save the universe from the forces of evil. Are you ready to unleash your inner warrior and restore balance to the universe?

name: Runic: Eternal Sunrise
summary: Travel alongside a cast of Celestials as you complete puzzles, defeat bosses, and unravel the mystery of the Eternal Sunrise in this Match-3 puzzle adventure.

name: Russian Fishing 4: Norwegian Sea
summary: Explore the sea and find fish with a powerful marine boat and a fish finder. Use a variety of tackle and bait to achieve the best result. Get new fishing experience and compete with other players.

name: Rubberduck Wave Racer
summary: Be a duckling - a squeaky duckling!

name: Run a Café
summary: Run a Café is a game where you do just that, run a Café! Make drinks from regular coffee, to iced flavored coffees and even serve food! Manage your inventory and time efficiently to ensure you maximize every customer! Start from nothing and build a full scale, dine-in Café!

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Golden Memories Edition
summary:
Rune Factory 3 Special “Golden Memories Edition” includes the following content:

Custom outer box featuring an original illustration based on the game’s anime opening
Rune Factory 3 Special Switch game card and case
An acrylic standee featuring protagonists from Rune Factory 3 Special, Rune Factory 4 Special, and Rune Factory 5 measuring six inches wide and four inches tall
An original soundtrack CD
A custom five-by-eight inches planner containing in-game seasons in addition to a real world calendar
Exclusive downloadable content “Swimsuit Mode” allowing for characters to appear in their swimsuits year-round

name: Rubble Trouble New York
summary: Take down New York buildings using a variety of destructive tools.

name: Russell's Range
summary: Complete tasks and keep the range running while following the rules and avoiding the creatures that lurk in the shadows.

name: Runic Defenders: Trials of Ascension
summary: Runic Defenders:Trials of Ascension is an action game where you control four humanoid characters with unique abilities and weapons. Your goal is to survive by defeating enemies using your characters' skills.As you kill enemies, you earn XP materials to upgrade your characters and make them stronger.

name: RuPaul's Drag Race Superstar
summary: Enter the iconic Werk Room and experience the fantastic fashion-conscious world of RuPaul’s Drag Race. Werk your way to be the top fashion designer and become a superstar stylist. Go shopping and select from hundreds of fashion dress-up pieces, put on that makeup and create the fiercest look to slay the runway.

name: Running Strike
summary: Running Strike is a real-time multi-player strategic game. You are running on randomly generated tracks to battle with other players, instantly. As a player, your mission is to guide our characters to overcome all obstacles along the track and win the game. With the help of items, skills and talent, you can choose the best strategy for each match. Players, join the world of Running Strike, lead our characters to success and be the Master of Running!

name: Run Sausage Run: Coins, Bugs and Chicken
summary:
Three new sausages: Fly, Cockroach and Plucked Chicken
and 15,000 coins to unlock your favorites sausages with powerups.

name: Run Tank Run
summary: Drive your tank, blast everything blocking your way, and rush forward with exhilaration.

name: Rustil: Eternal Labyrinth Castle
summary: In a randomly changing labyrinth castle, Rustil aims for the top floor. An exhilarating roguelike action game in which players aim to reach the top floor while efficiently strengthening the main character by acquiring abilities from the souls of heroes.

name: Run Sausage Run: Complete Edition
summary:
Complete Edition includes:
- base game with 150 deadly levels, over 80 jucy skins and tasty powerups,
- three new skins: Fly, Cockroach and Plucked Chicken,
- extra 15,000 coins to spend on outfits, powerups, or whatever.

name: Russian Psychiatric Pastoral
summary: An interactive movie that combines a psychiatrist simulator, a detective story and unique fight sequences. Take on the role of a psychiatrist, encounter various psychiatric diagnoses, and investigate disappearances of various people.

name: Rule the Waves 3
summary:
Build Your Navy, from pre-Dreadnoughts to Aircraft Carriers and Missile Cruisers!
Rule the Waves 3 is a simulation of naval ship design and construction, fleet management and naval warfare from 1890 to 1970 and will place you in the role of 'Grand Admiral' of a navy from the time when steam and iron dominated warship design up to the missile age. Rule the Waves 3 will let you design and build the ships of your navy, and lead them into battle when war erupts.

You will guide your navy's deployment, construction and operations during a period of great technological innovation and political tensions. While the game derives much of its technology and events from 'actual' history, you will find that you forge your own new history each and every time you play!

name: Rusty's Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty
summary: Rusty's Day Off is a stylized FPS metroidvania in which you play as a janitor caught up in a wild adventure on his day off. Armed with your gadgets, you must navigate through complex facilities, solve puzzles, defeat rogue robots and jump & run your way through this day.

name: Rustling Leaves
summary: A digital implementation of the 2020 roll-and-write board game designed by Paolo Mori.

name: Runaway Farm
summary: Runaway to Skipping Rock and reclaim your Grandma’s farm. You’re going to need to get crops in the ground, harvest and sell lumber, make a fishing pole and catch some fresh fish, and sell weekly at the Farmers Market!

name: Runner Roy
summary: Runner Roy is a sidescroller platformer where you have to count both on your skills and luck to overcome (and survive!) as many machines and obstacles along the way as you can.

name: Run Legends
summary:
Walk or run outside to fight “Sappers” - enemies that represent real-life anxieties. Build mental and physical health as you upgrade your gear, make new friends, and learn more about the characters' backstories.
Run Legends is the first-ever cooperative fitness game that you can play synchronously with your friends, no matter where they are in the world. Your movement controls your character: head outside and unleash skills in battle by moving faster and slower.

name: Rube Goldberg Workshop
summary: In Rube Goldberg Workshop, you can make tons of different machines from over 80 components. Go from virtual reality to mixed reality and use objects and surfaces in the real world as part of your creations. Bounce basketballs off your ceiling and into a set of drums! Use your kitchen table to set up an epic car stunt jump, equipped with fireworks and all! If you can imagine it, you can build it. Push the boundaries of your imagination in a game made for mixed reality.

name: RuneLight
summary: RuneLight is a Horde Survival Action Roguelite where you choose your equipment, craft your weapon to fit your build, and discover powerful fusions in order to take down hordes of powerful elementals

name: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma
summary: The classic action-RPG and life-simulation gameplay, beloved by Rune Factory fans across the globe, is taken in a bold new direction in Guardians of Azuma. This all-new adventure takes place in the never-before-seen eastern country of Azuma where you will assume the Earth Dancer powers and fight against the spreading Blight to bring hope back to this once-prosperous land.

name: Rune Factory 6
summary: This new entry will take place on the western continent of Adonea.

name: Running Circles
summary:
Play Running Circles! This game will have you Spinning around Dazed & Confused, hungry for one more go! This simple one touch Multiplayer Arcade game is totally Addictive and impossible to put down. How far can you go?

Your goal is to move from Circle to Circle taping the screen at just the right time. You can move both inside and outside the Circles but don’t waste a second… Danger lurks all around you.Great timing and lightning fast reflexes is all it takes to go as far as you can. Collect gold gems to Unlock tons of cool Characters that will help you on your journey.

name: RuneShroom
summary: RuneShroom is a 2D action platformer where you play as Mushu. You must journey forth! Armed with an array of hand animated spell to drive the snails who have decimated the your people's lands, and who now endanger the very diety who gave you life.

name: Rune Song
summary: Rune Song is a 2D action / adventure platformer, where you'll help Baba explore a vast and whimsical world in search of the fabled Rune Song.

name: Rush 'Hower
summary:
Jessie Trucker (aka J.T.) is the best at trucking. J.T. just wants to go home to Las Vegas with some Colorado love... But when J.T. runs into ski rush hour in the icy mountains of Colorado, putting on the brakes leads to Just Trouble!
How far can J.T. make it down the treacherous, never-ending windy roads of Eisenhower Pass without meeting a terrible end?

name: Runaway Train
summary:
Runaway Train is a single-level PWAD for Doom II and the ZDoom source port that was released in February 2001. It was designed by Nigel Rowand (Enjay) and uses the music track "Les Chants Magnétiques Part 2" by Jean-Michel Jarre, sequenced to MIDI.

Apart from a brief introductory scene at a train station, the entire map is set on a moving train which is on a collision course and going to crash in three minutes, giving the player limited time to get a key from one end of the train and return.

name: Ruins Story
summary: High-speed movement, aiming, and shooting with one finger operation! High tempo battle! Use unlocked items to come up with new builds and strategies each time you explore.

name: Run Ronaldo Run
summary: "Run Ronaldo Run" is a flash game where you play as Ronaldo Nazario, and you have to escape from Messi.

name: Run On
summary: The goal of this game is for the player to reach the goal while avoiding obstacles. Throughout the game, various obstacles appear, and the player's agility and strategic judgment play a crucial role. The game becomes easier for a limited amount of time whenever you obtain certain randomly generated items. Items provide various functions such as , jetpack, speed-up, etc., enhancing the excitement of the game

name: Rusty Lines Remastered
summary: We'd like to introduce to you yet another re-make of a widely known "Color Lines" game which we called "Rusty Lines"

name: Rush On
summary: Fast, score-based endless runner with procedurally generated levels. Perfect for a quick, intense game whenever you got a few minutes.

name: Russian Village Simulator
summary: This is a simulator of life in the Russian countryside, where the player will be engaged in the garden, picking mushrooms and berries, collect firewood, hunting and fishing, brew moonshine and much, much more.

name: Rulue's Iron-Fist Spring Break
summary:
Released in Vol 14, Rulue's Iron-Fist Spring Break is a visual novel starring Rulue. She is tasked to complete one of three objectives over her spring break: Find the five divine treasures, explore the "wonderful land," or gather ingredients for a recipe.

This game is mentioned, using the fan title of "Rulue's Spring Break of Fists", in Sega 3D Classics Collection's English-language manual for Puyo Puyo Tsu.

name: Runeroots TD
summary: A roguelike tower defense experience set in the Runeroots universe. Take on the alien invaders by upgrading your towers, unlocking unique perks, and building the perfect defense. Each run is a new challenge!

name: Runnordai
summary:
Enter the foreboding world of Runnordai, an eerie and unsettling game set within the confines of a sprawling hospital. As you navigate the labyrinthine corridors, your sole objective is to check every locker and uncover a crucial code needed to escape. But beware, a sinister figure lurks in the shadows, emerging at random intervals with distorted laughter and a chilling presence that clouds your vision.

Time is of the essence in this macabre chase. Lingering too long in a certain area spells doom, but swift evasion can keep you one step ahead. Equipped with a phone, you monitor ventilation issues, while managing the battery levels of both your phone and computer. The PC serves as your lifeline to rectify the escalating ventilation problems, its power restored through a strategically placed lever within the map.

Immerse yourself in the chilling atmosphere of Runnordai, where each step could be your last. Unlock the secrets within the hospital's walls, confront your pursuer, and strive to escape this haunting nightmare. Are you ready to embrace the darkness and face the unknown?

name: Rusty Robot Wants to Cry
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of retro-games as a roller robot. From platformers and side-scrollers, to the legendary Arkanoid, Xonix, Digger and Snake. Jump across platforms and fight glitch bosses. Colorful graphics, effects galore, and chiptune music. Anyone but a robot would cry from nostalgia!

name: Russpuppy Kid Books
summary: Your child will explore interactive stories, enjoy engaging reading games, and even bring their own book to life. Foster creativity, vocabulary, and a love for learning. Encourage the budding reader and writer in your young one. Experience the thrill of learning!

name: Russian Square Plus! Edition
summary:
A 3D Tetris-like puzzle game. Erase lines or columns by regrouping shapes of the same color. More columns or rows appear at a faster pace as the game progresses resulting in a race against the clock.

All of the games use 3D graphics, themes, sound effects and music to take advantage of the operating system's DirectX capabilities.

name: Running Late 2
summary: 16-ish Boom compatible levels. ZDoom based ports will have to level warp in order to access the secret levels, since Map14 sends you to the EndDoom screen. BOOM ports can access these maps regularly from Map15.

name: Rushdown Revolt: Pool Party Seth
summary: Dive into the refreshing waves of victory with Seth's Pool Party skin in Rushdown Revolt!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Pool Party Ashani
summary: Get ready to bring the heat to the summer battles with Ashani's Pool Party skin in Rushdown Revolt.

name: Rushdown Revolt: Pool Party Zhurong
summary: As the saying goes, the pool noodle is mightier than the sword. With noodle in hand, she shows opponents that a playful spirit can still pack a punch, leaving them soaked and defeated in her wake!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Pool Party Weishan
summary: Experience the scorching heat of the season with Weishan's Pool Party skin in Rushdown Revolt!

name: Ruby: Huntress of Vale
summary: Ruby: Huntress of Vale is an alternate universe fan project centered around a 2D action beat-em-up game. This project is based on the web series RWBY originally by Monty Oum & Rooster Teeth.

name: Rusting Souls
summary: Rusting Souls is a visual novel made in 4 days by Youli, Clémancipé and KuroYuki for the VN Cup. It's a short experience where two women, X and Y, confront the limits of their own body, in a dull atmosphere of a destroyed world.

name: Russian Train Trip 3
summary: A first-person adventure game with a deep plot. You have to get from Tyumen to Novosibirsk on a passenger train. You can look out the window and watch the changing nature, weather and architecture. You can see forests, fields, mountains, cities and villages.

name: Run Bunny Home
summary:
Help the bouncing bunny get home, jumping from platform to platform, pick up eggs, eat carrots, and bounce balloons, pick up your baby bunnies to get points along the way. Do not fall off the boards as you get home.
The game has 16 levels, after you make it to the bunny house you pass a level, and the next level is unlocked.
The higher levels get harder, you need to jump higher to make it, and it is easier to fall. The platforms are shorter, and some of them are rickety and will fall down when you jump on them.
You can skip a level if you have earned enough stars in the game, even if you don't pass a level, this can help if you just can't finish one level.
The game is supported by ads, but there is an in app purchase to turn all the ads off. There is another version of this game Run Bunny Kids that has no ads, no in app purchases, no videos, and all levels are unlocked for easy use by kids.
You can buy extra carrots with an in app purchase, but these are the same as the carrots you pick up in the game.
You can also get extra bunnies buy watching videos if you want, these can be traded in the store for extra lives, the adopt button watches those videos to get bunnies. Trade bunnies for extra lives in the store.
You should bring the baby bunnies you find along the platforms home with you instead, if you bounce into a baby bunny it comes with you. Get your baby bunnies home with you, and you earn those baby bunny points. Every 5 points gets you an extra life in the store.
After every game you can get to the store with the store icon, or you can get to the store when you pause the game with the pause icon by pushing the || sign during the game. If you press the + sign on the top of the purse, you go to the store.

name: Run Kelvin: Penguin Escape
summary:
A little baby penguin named "Kelvin", who does not know how to swim yet, was left behind and now needs to run and escape to his family and safety.
During his run in Antarctica, he has to do his bit to fight pollutants left by human activities and clean up the environment to reduce a few degrees Kelvin (or Celsius/Fahrenheit) as for him, melting ice is not just about rising sea levels and global warming, it is not being able to see his family ever again in the changing landscape.
Run, jump, even try and fly he must, but at the same time avoid his natural enemies and hit back at the man-made ones.

name: Runes of Aereal
summary: In this fast paced rogue-like deckbuilder you can roam the islands of the Aereal archipeligo in search of the 9 runes that grant immortality.

name: Rune Coliseum: Chained Warrior
summary: A prologue to a RuneColiseum: deck-building roguelike game with unique semi-real-time combat system. Take your first steps in the Coliseum as a Chained Warrior. Find your fighting style and become the ultimate champion in this thrilling death tournament.

name: Rush: Run Up Super High
summary: Join this intense MMO 3D precision platformer! Leap, parkour, and climb massive, uncharted locations and compete against 199 others in a race to the top. With a perfect character control system, all you need is focus and patience to smash records and reach unprecedented heights!

name: Ru Lin Wai Shi Fan Jin
summary: Fan Jin, who has failed in the exam for decades, has only one way to change his life - to pass the exam and become a successful candidate.

name: Ruins of the Lost
summary: Ruins of the Lost is an action roguelike game set in the remnants of an ancient civilization. You'll face off against a variety of evil minions while exploring the mysterious environment. Discover and use unique bows to adapt your combat style as you confront increasingly challenging enemies.

name: Run Fire
summary: Nothing but shoot every thing.The only thing to worry about is not having enough bullets.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Bat & Switch
summary: The main focus of this game is using the bat and manipulating it to hit the ball to your advantage. The challenges consist of 5 levels of the following; basic hitting, tricky throws, multiple pitchers, hitting fastballs and taking out UFOs. The second set of challenges incorporates multiple of this aspect and tighter restrictions.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Gear Games
summary: Clean a glove, balance a ball on a bat and more in Gear Games.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Volley Bats
summary: Play a version of volleyball with sticks in this game.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Cage Match
summary: Similar to Bat & Switch however there are different ways to receive extra points (hit a robot pitcher or hit high enough to hit the Home Run button).

name: Ruins and Refuge
summary: Ruins and Refuge is a first person fantasy RPG dungeon crawler. Fight menacing beasts as you gather loot and rare materials. Select your class with weapon specialty and abilities. Gear up for your next adventure in up to 3 player co-op or face the danger ALONE!

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Feel the Glove
summary: Feel the Glove has the player play the various role of the fielder from catching pop flies to getting to a grounder.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: The Aim Game
summary: Use the 3DS gyroscope to the throw balls at targets.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Drop & Pop
summary: Match buttons to tires to make the tower smaller. Knock all of them as fast as you can.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Make the Call
summary: Make the Call has the player play as the umpire and call the pitches. This is one of the 2 games you can get a demo out of (with just the first 6 Challenges). The demo is unlocked by buying 3 other key games.; once you buy the full version for $4.00 or $2.00 after haggling with Rusty, the demo will be replaced with the full version.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Bat Master
summary: Bat Master has the player customize bats to use in other games.

name: Run Away
summary: Fight against nightmares and survive in a cooperative horror game for 1-3 players. Explore dark locations, and gather resources for survival. Your decisions determine the fate of the heroes and reveal the secrets of this sinister world. Only through teamwork can you conquer this nightmare.

name: RunNCrush
summary: RunNCrush is a party platformer game where you play your friends in various mini games. Try your hand at soccer, racing, and more, while crushing your pals!

name: Rust: Console Edition - New Cobalt Employee Welcome Pack
summary:
Buy the New Cobalt Employee - Welcome Pack for Rust Console Edition.

Welcome to Cobalt. Our ‘New Cobalt Employee - Welcome Pack' has everything you need to start your new career with us. Out here on the frontier of science and technology, you'll need every advantage if you want to succeed. [Redacted]. Start your career with us in quintessential Cobalt style.

You will receive receive the following, Cobalt-themed items:
1500 Rust Coins
A customary rock skin
Standard-issue Cobalt jacket, trousers and shoes skins
Your very own Cobalt furnace skin
A cosy sleeping bag skin
A wooden door skin

name: Rune Golf
summary: Guide a small golf ball through the ruins of a forgotten civilization, filled with traps and mysteries. Explore the remnants of a lost people, combining skill and curiosity in a unique narrative and contemplative journey!

name: RunOut: Hothead Paws
summary: RunOut is an online party platformer game for 2 to 6 players! Pick a cute animal character, race through unpredictable obstacle courses, collect coins, and be the first to grab the stuffed bear. Prepare for a fun, fast-paced mix of running, fighting, and partying!

name: Ruthless:1
summary: Ruthless:1 combines ARPG Hack and Slash with creature collection and puts it into a war-torn sci-fi world. Destroy enemy Mechs, grow your army and build the ultimate roster. Countless skills and items allow you to play the style you like.

name: Rubido
summary: A Chinese checkers / solitaire game with 4 difficulties for Playdate

name: Run or Die
summary: Embark on an adventure across multiple worlds in this dynamic 3D platformer! Utilize the BunnyHOP ability to leap through obstacles, face unique challenges, and uncover hidden secrets. Fun and excitement are guaranteed with every jump!

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Digital Deluxe Edition
Run For Exodus
summary: You find yourself in a zombie apocalypse in our RUN FOR EXODUS game specially designed for VR. Alone, wield weapons with real-life moves and explore a post-apocalyptic world in virtual reality. Get rid of these dead with the quests.

name: Rune Gate
summary: Rune Gate is a deck-building roguelite where you design your own cards by slotting in runes of various elements. Gather your party, craft your runes, gear up and defend against hordes of enemies from the Rune Gate. How long can you survive?

name: Rupture
summary: Ultimate Doom episode with 9 levels which run in episode 4

name: RubyDung
summary:
RubyDung was an unreleased base-building strategy game prototype created by Markus “Notch” Persson. Developed prior to Minecraft, the project was inspired by Dwarf Fortress, but with a focus on accessibility.

The name "RubyDung" was a placeholder name for a "DUNGeon game in the RUBYlands", the "Rubylands" being a rough idea for a game world that Notch had.

During the later stages of RubyDung’s development, Persson discovered the indie multiplayer game Infiniminer, developed by Zachtronics. This inspired him to experiment with a fantasy-themed, first-person, block-based prototype, reusing and adapting portions of RubyDung’s code and assets.

That experimental prototype demonstrated strong performance and positive early reception, leading Persson to abandon RubyDung entirely and pursue the new project full-time. This work would eventually become Minecraft, with RubyDung serving as a direct technical and conceptual predecessor.

name: Ruins of Sathryn
summary: This is a fairly open map with a desert and ruins theme, offering plenty of chaotic combat and a fairly simple progression.

name: Rust'N Ruin
summary: Dive into 'Rust’N Ruin' an atmospheric 3D adventure in a post-apocalyptic steampunk world. Sneak and run through a world where all living creatures have turned against humans. Dodge monsters, and robots; find a way home. Be quick in danger and be clever with puzzles. Brace for boss epic battles.

name: Rune Bender VR
summary: Rune Bender is a fast-paced single player rogue-like VR Wave-Shooter in which players fight against monster waves from Slavic mythology to protect the shrine of the god “Veles” Draw runes to cast spells of different elements and shoot them wisely against "Perun" the mad god of thunder.

name: Russian Fight Simulator
summary: Russian Fight Simulator is a 2-D combat simulator with many different weapons, maps and views to choose from!

name: Run From Mummies
summary: Be the tourist you were born to be! Play solo or tour with your friends, but make sure to run from mummies!

name: Rumia Throws!
summary: Throw! Kick! Ride!A 2D action game where Touhou's Rumia goes wild throwing things!

name: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
summary: A baby-fresh take on retro-inspired gameplay, featuring a unique co-op design, where kids and parents need to stick together to win!

name: RunnerSky
summary: The lost soul wanders and runs aimlessly in the distant sky.

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Another Episode Pack
summary: This content requires the base game Rune Factory 3 Special on Steam in order to play.

name: Runner Fruit Jumping
summary: 'Runner Fruit Jumping' is a cartoon style leisure game. The small animals controlled by the player rotate on the fruit. You need to jump the small animals from one fruit to another.

name: Rush Commander
summary: Rush Commander is a direct action strategy game with one simple order, MOVE!You take the role of a commander in the World War II theater, and you must ensure to survive. Move your company, improve it, and request reinforcements to win!

name: Ruinsmagus: Complete
summary: Complete the Magic – The complete edition of RUINSMAGUS includes both the main game and its DLC, The Warrior and the Tailor, all in one convenient bundle. Everything is included! This also includes full English voice-over, and you can also enjoy the original Japanese voice-over with English subtitles.

name: Ruinsmagus: The Warrior and the Tailor
summary: Adorned with shops, a river, and new townsfolk Grand Amnis has never felt more alive with this brand-new area! When exploring this new area, Iris and you discover a mysterious shop. Enchanted by its offerings, Iris is drawn in to learn more about its wares and terrifying shopkeeper….

name: Rubinite
summary: "Rubinite" is a dark fantasy boss rush action game that utilizes the unique mechanic "Focus" to pinpoint enemies' weaknesses and execute thrust attacks. Follow Ruby, a princess who has escaped from the Scarlet Kingdom, embarking on a journey of revenge to reclaim her kingdom.

name: Rushdown Rivals
summary: Drive back evil robotic versions of several NG characters as your own NG icon. Stylishly dance through them as Cassette Girl, shoot them with Hank's personal arsenal, unleash Girlfriend's inner demon, and so much more in this tough-as-nails action game

name: Russian Roulette
summary:
Russian Roulette is a 3D action game, and the first game published by Buka, formerly only a distributor in Russia.

A ring of planets, connected by galactic portals has become lost in space. The planets are devastated and the portals have been disassembled. It is up to you to you to find the missing parts of the portals so they can be reactivated.

You can exit and enter any vehicle you encounter at will, and many have turrets that can rotate independently. In some levels you will be accompanied by an NPC who will guide you to the next portal part.

name: Russian Roulette II: The Next Worlds
summary:
Russian Roulette II: The Next Worlds is a 3D shooter and sequel to Russian Roulette.

In the game you have to, again, unite six planets through the activation of galactic portals. Each of the planets features a completely different theme, ranging from prehistoric, to medieval and futuristic.

You can move around the worlds freely, both on foot or using the various vehicles available to you, including tanks, jeeps, space ships, or even live dragons or giant grasshoppers.

name: Ruined District
summary: Ruined District is a short city map for RAMP 2023 back in June, now revised and playing/looking a bit better than its first version. Adding traps to some areas and making the map just a tad harder overall.

name: Runner's High
summary: This game was originally featured as part of Compile's own Disc Station Vol. 10 (1996) for PC-98. Racing game featuring a girl with a jetpack.

name: Rumic Harrier
summary: A manga-themed hack for Space Harrier starring Rumiko Takahashi.

name: Run 'n Gun: Deluxe
summary: Welcome to a world that is full of danger, and your task is to destroy all enemies on your way in the original Run and Gun style!

name: Rusty Ride
summary: Take the wheel as a gritty veteran in a jetpack-equipped car with a tank cannon. Traverse dynamic, procedurally generated landscapes, obliterate obstacles, and unlock explosive upgrades. A thrilling, action-packed adventure awaits!

name: Running Fox
summary: A sweet little indie game where you need to run with the little fox through a whole level of ups and downs. To complete the game, you need to collect all of the 100 gems. You may need to keep your eyes open to even find the hardest hideouts. Can you do so?

name: Rust Rails
summary: Rust Rails is a 2D roguelike platformer. You have to travel by train through randomly generated locations, collect resources, craft equipment, and fight enemies. On your journey you will be helped by a mysterious robot and other inhabitants of this world.

name: Russian Warship
summary: This game is a comic relief in the otherwise tragic war in Ukraine. Based on many popular jokes, it mixes shoot 'em up and tower defense genres to create an action-filled top-down shooting experience which requires tactical thinking and smart resource management

name: Rulegement
summary: Can you run a big business from scratch? What if you sink, can you come out again? Own a big business and turn every part of the city into money.

name: Rusty Rabbit
summary: Millennia after humanity abandoned the planet, rabbits claimed their place... Stamp, a cute bunny with an old soul, pilots his trusty mech "Junkster" through the giant ruins of a frozen world in this 2.5D action belt scroller.

name: Ruin
summary: Escape the levels of Ruin in this 2D platformer with tight controls where you traverse dangerous traps and difficult obstacles.

name: Run Ran! Side Scrollers
summary: Random stage generation. The length of the stages can be freely determined. You can freely decide the length of each stage, so you can play quickly in your spare time or take your time. Enjoy always fresh play and challenge your own limits in Time Attack.

name: Ruby Crush
summary: A puzzle game for the Uzebox, parody of Candy Crush.

name: Russian Pinocchio
summary:
The story of Pinocchio began with the translation of Carlo Collodi's Italian fairy tale Pinocchio, but then developed into a completely different, author Alexei Tolstoy's story. He brought more adventurism and fun to the story and added many new details and changes.

The story was adapted for film, theatrical productions, and the tale itself was published in the USSR 182 times, was translated into 47 languages, and reached a total circulation of 14.5 million copies.

How different is Tolstoy's version from Carlo Collodi's tale, so unique is the graphic version by artist Ekaterina Volzhina! She retains Tolstoy's entire plot, but brings it to modern Russia! Her story is told without a single word, but with incredibly beautiful illustrations and love for the source material.

name: Rush City
summary: Endless runner addictive fun from the developer of the #1 smash hit game Air Hockey! You are the sole survivor, hunted by evil humans...you must escape from Rush City! Jump from rooftop to rooftop, dodge helicopters, run as fast as you can! Buff up with piles of challenging objectives & use super powers to out score your friends!

name: Rushing Punch
summary: Xbox Live indie game by Divider Games

name: Rush Back
summary: The teletransporter that Duke Used in MibTELE to come back to earth, lost it's frequency and the antimatter resonance got absorbed by an electrical storm of biblical proportions, apparently caused by a strange mineral that has been found inside of a coke mine, this mineral that is no less than the one allowing the teletransportation, in big quantities, it generates a magnetic field able to change the polarity of an electrical current from a radio of 3 to 5 miles, and given it's qualities it's being exploited by the hydroelectric company from the zone where the mineral has been found. Duke's problem lies on the fact that communications are being interrupted by the leaking of said mineral from a capsule that was accidentally destroyed, and the matter, when being vaporized, it generated this huge storm that puts the entire zone in jeopardy by the mere fact that the dam where the company used to substract it's energy, is being collapsed and about to crumble, with the fore coming catastrophe, Duke must enter the mine to find the mineral core and destroy it to prevent the invasion of the aliens.

name: Rusty Barrel
summary:
Rusty barrel is a short horror game in which you pilot a small, cramped and old submarine. You have to move through narrow openings in gorges on the ocean floor.

The game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 54 on the theme "Limited Space". Inspired by the game Iron lung.

name: Runes
summary: Runes is a single player fantasy open world rpg. You take on the roles of both Talesin, a flawed sorcerer, and Olwyna, a head-strong young thief, as they investigate the origins of a mysterious new potion in the town of Lewyst.

name: Rubicon: Cubindom
summary: Rubicon is a turn-based puzzle game based on the principle of the Rubik's Cube. Use the game mechanics that the world has loved and our innovations to restore order to the inhabitants of Cubindom.

name: Running Through The Beat
summary: Synchronize yourself on the music and Run Through The Beat!

name: Run Gor
summary: Dreams, synonymous with suffering and regrets. You are not sure what happened. Solve the mystery that surrounds you to get ahead, or not? Only you will know.

name: Ruins of Mazotac
summary: Small green Wizard-textured temple ruins with some ancient machinery. The map source is included.

name: Rubicondom
summary: Large Rubicon-style industrial base. A chain map by NotoriousRay, RPG, PuLSaR, Zwiffle, and distrans.

name: Runic Recycling
summary: Medium-sized metal/runic style level with classic gameplay, a built-in skill-selection room and an additional alternative game mode.

name: Ruined Nation
summary: Medium-sized base map using Doom 3 textures. It comes with a number of custom ambient sounds and features hard combat.

name: Ruff Ghanor
summary: Ruff Ghanor is a Deckbuilder game with Roguelite elements, where each collected card represents a crucial action in your journey. Build the perfect deck, strategize, and create powerful synergies as you progress to face your destiny.

name: Runic Warrens
summary: Small linear map in a runic style. Uses progs_dump (included) for a couple of enemy tweaks. Map source is included.

name: Rust in Peace
summary: Medium sized original Metal-style windtunnel base map.

name: Running Crazy
summary: I have been waiting for you for a long time. The beauties are waiting for you at the finish line. Run!

name: Rushdown Rivals Reloaded
summary: Take on the robot hordes of Rushdown Rivals from a different perspective! Fight through the city streets in this hectic arcade shooter inspired by Time Crisis and House of the Dead!

name: Rural Nightmare
summary: A meteorite crashed in the southern village and aliens took over the northern village. The few inhabitants who survived started to build walls all around the place to prevent the aliens from coming in but they didnt have enough time and the aliens did manage to come in. You wake up in your bedroom after a bad dream and thats where the level starts. Find your way to the village and kick some alien asses

name: Runemancer
summary: Runemancer is a strategic party-based RPG game where you match runes to empower your team mates. Fight hordes of enemies and unlock new powers in this fast-paced single-player game.

name: Ruin
summary: Ruin is a free to play survival sci-fi sandbox MMORPG indie game where you try to survive on mankinds attempt to colonize a distant planet. Chances are stacked against you, but don't give up. You are most likely the last human alive. It is up to you and you alone to do what you must to stay alive.

name: Rush
summary: This is a competitive game with exquisite art style and a relaxed and enjoyable experience.

name: Rulers of Aden
summary: A fantasy turn-based indie rpg with character customization and enemies that may leave you struggling.

name: Rumba Lumber
summary: Rumba Lumber is an Action game, developed and published by Taito Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1984.

name: Ruin
summary: Ruin takes place in a ravaged city guarded by a whole lot of sentry drones

name: Ruins To Fortress
summary: Explore a post-apocalyptic island, craft, build, tear down enemy bases, defend and nuke your rivals! Life's about surviving in this multiplayer game, no matter what it takes!

name: Rugrats: Match-Master
summary: Generic memory game featuring characters from the cartoon

name: Rui wa Tomo o Yobu
summary: kutsu Tomo was brought up by his mother as a girl due to a small mark he has on his body. After his mother's death, he discovers via her will that she emphasizes Tomo continue to live as a female, and following this, Tomo starts to go through more troubles in his life. Tomo soon discovers that he is linked with five girls who are around his age as a second year high school student. These girls happen to have the same mark he has, and also have been going through hardships in their lives. Tomo and these five girls decide to form a pact to stay together and support each other to solve each of their problems and to bring peace to their lives.

name: Ruma
summary: A base around a brown canyon.

name: Run Buddy
summary: Run Buddy, stylized as "run buddy", is a single map for Boom by Michael Krause released in April 1998. Its notability is in the large scale of its architecture and liberal use of open spaces, which contributed to slowdown issues due to reject inefficiencies. A "fast" version using RMB to calculate the reject was released in May 1998.

name: Ruiga Pirates
summary: Kill thousands of pirates and sea creatures and survive! Ruiga Pirates is a game with survivors-like elements; Choose upgrades, get ready for bullet hell against hundreds of attacking enemies!

name: Rugby League Riot
summary: This sports game is must for any Rugby League fan! Choose from 17 teams, play a singles match or compete in a finals series. Unique gameplay, no controller required. Operate the ball carrier, many pass and kick options, simple defensive play. Fatigue system, commentary, TV theme design.

name: Run and Fire
summary: Run and Fire is a 2D platformer with shooter elements in which you have to fight enemies.

name: Run and Hide
summary: The player needs to hide in objects from the hunter. Each item has a lifetime, when the item dies the player is thrown out of it.

name: Runehaven
summary: Runehaven is a voxel-based atmospheric first-person roguelike dungeon crawler. Explore eerie, procedurally generated dungeons, battle vile creatures, solve puzzles, discover hidden secrets, and dodge deadly traps in your quest for survival!

name: Run x Gun
summary: Run and gun while you shoot down hoards of alien space ships in a bullet hell shooter/endless runner. Upgrade you gun with various power ups and weapon types like rockets, grenades and lasers. And finally defeat menacing boss ships to save the world from the scourge of alien invaders.

name: Rutabaga Desert Storm
summary: Lead the vegetable revolution alone or with a friend in the side-scrolling shoot ‘em up Rutabaga Desert Storm! Take down wave after wave of enemies, dodge their projectiles, and grab power-ups to boost your destruction! Can you defeat the oppressive humans and free the proletariat vegetable masses?

name: Run Pizza Run
summary: Do you like challenges? Then this game is for you! Manage a delivery man and deliver all the pizzas to the address. But remember, it won't be easy. Good luck!

name: RunBunRunBun
summary: RunBunRunBun is an Action Survival Rougelite Bullet Hell. Face off bosses and swarms of computer viruses using a vast arsenal of weapons and abilities. Select upgrades to create a build that can wipe out enemies in an instant.

name: Runaround Reaper
summary: Evade death for as long as possible! A PlayJam 4 game.

name: Rumble Club
summary:
Fall into the physics-based massive multiplayer Battle Royale! Join the epic knockout madness with up to 20 clumsy players and punch, push, throw, or trick opponents out of the arena!

Fly in on Captain Punch’s Sky Yacht, get bopped into the arena, find silly Gadgets to battle with, and survive the dropping floor and shrinking battlefield to be the last player standing! Are you ready to punch your way to victory and become the ultimate champion?

name: Rushing Beat: Translation
summary: Rushing Beat was released outside Japan as Rival Turf!, but its story was changed in this release. This rom hack allows you to play the original version of the game in English (keeping the story, character names and some other aspects).

name: Ruindog
summary: After centuries of invincibility, it became popular for humans to watch live alien hunting shows, participate in alien hunts, save up money, equipment, and use all the loot you find to move on to new maps and defeat more powerful enemies.

name: Rusty's Retirement
summary: Rusty's Retirement is an idle-farming simulator designed to sit at the bottom of your screen allowing you to work on other tasks while caring for your farm.

name: Russia
summary: Russia is an unlicensed puzzle game for the NES that is found in unlicensed plug and plug systems. The game is a clone of Tetris.

name: Rune in the Three Kingdoms
summary: The game currently adopts Diablo-like gameplay and data. the concepts of anger system, general system, and attack distance have been emphasized. In order to enhance the game experience, the levels and values ​​required for some data have been modified.

name: Run Tekila Run!
summary: Get ready for a fast-paced, magical combat/comedy game battling fearsome zombie hordes!

name: Ruff City
summary: Grab a friend and dog pile on foes in the action packed 2D adventure!

name: Rubber Royale: Holiday Prologue
summary: Get ready for a frantic experience in this 8-player mayhem of a game. Run, hit, jump and throw your opponents in the wackiest way possible. The only Xmas game that rewards you for being naughty instead of nice.

name: Runner
summary: This is a motion capture game with a focus on parkour. The player's computer needs to be equipped with a camera to better experience the game. After starting the game, the camera will capture the movements of the human body in real time.

name: Run and Retry
summary: In this fast and demanding game, the player must demonstrate mastery to managing his skills, in order to beat the world record. The gameplay is geared so that players can challenge each other.

name: Ruthless Smile
summary: Ruthless Smile is the story of a girl named Ururu who was trying to save her friends from their cruel fate of becoming God-Bound. Explore an episodic story of humans and Gods and the cruel world they face.

name: Run Show Quest
summary: Simple, casual game where you run as a teenager, dodging obstacles for points. Cartoon graphics, easy for all ages.

name: Run Elephant Run
summary: Just keep going.

name: Rune Rhetoric
summary:
In Rune Rhetoric’s Earth, a portion of humans are able to use their Inner Rune, a mysterious and personal source of magic that they may channel through weapons or through spells.

The game takes place on a fictional continent, named Midmund, which is occupied by two dominant empires; The Reme Empire of the western half and the Hon Empire of the eastern half. Guess what? They're at war.

But the war isn't the real point here, it's just what is happening at the time. The player will experience the perspectives of several individuals in a nationalistic and hostile environment. Why do they fight in wars? Are their reasons for fighting good enough? Are they really fighting for what they think they are fighting for?

Step into the shoes of a lowly villager, Dahnzell, entranced by images of glory and a reclusive prince, Nero, starved of answers for profound questions in a fight for clarity and change.

name: Run Witch
summary:
Help Dona across 6 levels to go defeat the monster that terrorizes her village.
Run, jump, and cast magic with all your skills in this old school 2D world.
Do it fast and enter the world leaderboard with your best times.

name: Russell
summary: When a scarred bounty hunter recruits the Courier to assist in tracking down an infamous scalp-hunter, he/she immediately becomes wrapped up in a prolonged hunt for a ruthless, calculating target.

name: Russki Duck
summary: In this espionage game you search for some top-secret plans which a hidden in a rubber duck while enemy spies are hunting you.

name: Run and Gun
summary: Run and Gun is an action roguelike shooting game where you mow down thousands of enemies while unlocking newer and deadlier weapons. The enemies won't stop spawning, and your guns won't stop firing. Earn gold each run to unlock permanent upgrades to make your next run deadlier.

name: Ruins: The Gate of Rebirth
summary: You will play a dark knight who goes into the dungeon, a corrupt village, and a scary graveyard to explore, holds magic cards, repels the enemy, and finally investigates the strange things that happened in Omos Village

name: Ruinarch + Legend of Keepers: Overlord Bundle
summary: Become an evil lord in Ruinarch or Legend of Keepers!

name: Rubber Hose Rampage
summary: Rubber Hose Rampage is a classic 2D action game filled with 21 boss battles. Inspired by classical music and rubber hose animation from the 1920s and 1930s.

name: Russian Soul Simulator
summary: Russian Soul Simulator is a meditative game that allows the player to look at the Russian nature and the surrounding world in realistic graphics. The game allows the hero to move freely through fields and forests, explore the surrounding terrain and interact with various objects.

name: Russel's Animal Kwackers
summary: A web based taxidermy system for you to make special animals and stuff... something may be happening deep down in the bowels of Kong Studios... so the time is right to assist Russel in building up an army of beasts!...

name: Run Away
summary: Run Away: Build, Dodge, Collect! Dive into the zany world of "Run Away," where block platforms, portal-hopping, and bull-dodging collide! Choose from adorable characters, build your way to victory, and face off against charging bulls. Ready for a hilarious adventure? Let the chaos begin!

name: Ruins of the Forgotten: A Wild Survival
summary: "Ruins of the Forgotten" is more than survival; it's a story where choices shape your destiny. Conquer the jungle, reveal secrets, and leave a legacy in mysterious ruins.

name: Rush'n Attack
summary: The NES port of Rush'n Attack, a run & gun shooter by Konami, also known by the title Green Beret, in which the player takes the role of a soldier infiltrating a military base.

name: Ruined
summary: The world has been RUINED. You awake to a mysterious world overrun by monsters. Journey through the mountains with an army of monsters by your side to uncover the secrets of this world and rebuild hope!

name: Runaway Bride
summary: Runaway bride - help a beautiful woman to leave her life and run away from undesired wedding.

name: Runonce
summary:
RUNONCE (remember_me) is an existential desktop friend that knows you have doomed it by running it.
You can only run it once, and then never again.
Be a friend while they are here.
Whatever you save will be all that remains.

name: Rubbings
summary: Rubbings is a Chinese folklore horror puzzle game. Four unbelievable topiaries follow each other like shadows, and four creepy stories come to mind in the middle of the night.

name: Rude Chess
summary:
Use arrow keys to walk, R to restart and Z to undo

Push blocks & chess pieces onto the grey Xs

Chess pieces will try to make your life harder, this'll be explained better in-game

Wow

name: Rust Song
summary: Explore this unique sci-fi style metroidvania-like adventure world. You can acquire a variety of abilities to explore the world and assemble powerful chip combinations. You'll also have the ability to go back in time to change the map's structure and unlock shortcuts.

name: Rush Hero
summary: Touch and drag to move the hero in order to avoid the falling rocks!!! What is your best score?

name: Rug Rats
summary: You have to eliminate some pests while vacuuming the floor.

name: Russian Hut Simulator
summary: An interactive tour of a traditional wooden hut.

name: Runestone: Pathfinders
summary: "Runestone: Pathfinder" is a 3D adventure platformer game set in the world of Runestone. Players will play as a rookie pathfinder and help the rookie get through his first trial.

name: Rune Gate: Retribution
summary: Rune Gate: Retribution is a roguelite deckbuilder centered on card customization. Craft unique battle strategies with different runes. Face continuous challenges, where every choice can lead to victory or defeat. Dive into Rune Gate, unleash creativity, and explore endless card combinations.

name: Run for the Bus
summary: "Run for the Bus" is a 3D third-person she-runner game. A girl who overslept in the morning runs after the bus she missed. Let her build her strength and chase her bus as she eats the bread.

name: Runombie
summary: In a misty forest, you play as a hungry zombie, you constantly run, must catch up with humans to fuel to survive, careful not to run into your own kind.

name: RUVN Contest Reboot
summary: Experience the heated philosophical debate between Orika and her gang in this kinematic visual novel.

name: Runn 'n' Gunn
summary: Willamina “Willie” Runn and Wallace “Wally” Gunn were two run-of-the-mill infantry until an army experiment went seriously wrong and fused their bodies into a super soldier. Run, jump, shoot and explore your way to victory on an alien planet.

name: Ruthnar Online
summary: Ruthnar Online is a free sandbox 2D MMORPG where you can face powerful creatures to develop your character in an open medieval fantasy world and craft your own equipment with eight diferent professions. The game also features guild wars and four different factions, join one of them to defend it and raid enemy cities. Finally, when you get strong enough you'll be able to fight in the BattleGrounds: Stronghold Conquests, Combat Arenas, Survival/Battle Royale, Leagues, Tournaments and more.

name: Ruins Escape
summary: Ruins Escape is a thrilling and challenging game that puts you in the shoes of a character trapped in an ancient ruins complex.

name: Rum Skulls
summary: Embark on an epic open-world survival pirate adventure in Rum Skulls. Sail the high seas, form a pirate crew, conquer islands, and face deadly sea monsters. Become the most feared pirate captain in the Caribbean!

name: Running Fred
summary: Running Fred combines ridiculously natural controls and fast-paced action with the shameless buckets of blood praised in its prequel, creating a fantastic third-person platformer unmatched on mobile devices!

name: Runa
summary: An indie adventure inspired by JRPG classics, with turn-based battle system, social links and a story-rich science fantasy world.

name: Russian CyberVillage Simulator
summary: Develop a village colony on Mars, using various resources and bringing the unique flavor of Russian culture to the distant space.

name: Rune No Joka: Hikari To Yami No Seioujo
Run from the Light
summary:
Have you ever wondered about what lies in the dark?
Have you ever thought about the mysteries that belong in the darkness and the shadows?
Well if you have I don't have the answer for that, but in "Run from the Light" you become one with the shadows, only to come across light spots falling from the sky! Don't let them touch you, otherwise, the darkness will not be happy and absorb you entirely.

name: Run Run Bird!
summary: Embark on a whimsical journey into the enchanting world of our beloved animal friends with "Run Run Bird!"

name: Run Dungeon
summary: Run Dungeon combines the heart-pounding action of an endless runner combined with the strategic depth of an RPG. An infinite dungeon full of monsters, loot, traps, spells, and bosses awaits you.

name: Rusted Sea
summary: Earth's surface has been dessimated by radiation from The War. The only remaining safe havens are found under the seas. Now you must cook, craft, and survive alone in your submarine, delivering vital supplies to the Starving Survivors - all while battling monsters both real and imagined.

name: Running Pet
summary:
Welcome to Running Pet, the endless running game! Jump, slide, and dodge various obstacles to pick up gold coins on the road . An exciting adventure is calling you!

Our pet pal Sunny Cat and his friends want to build a dream home. Can you help them? Use gold coins to buy more furniture to decorate their home! Unlock Buck, Luna, Bao, Jack, and George by building rooms.

Collect skateboard pieces, unlock unique abilities, and skating on city streets. Explore the subway, jungle and more areas, push your limits in mystical realms, and take on thrilling challenges in a variety of landscapes.

Challenging daily tasks and unlock wonderful areas. Jump into the adventure and play now!

name: Rune Defender
summary: Rune Defender is a grid based tower defense game. You build towers during the day and defend against the undead during the night.

name: Runemon
summary: Runemon is a 1-3 player monster-taming game. Start an epic adventure with your friends, catch all the Runemon in the world, build a powerful squad and defeat your rivals in turn-based combat.

name: Russian Roulette: Online
summary: "Russian Roulette: Online" is a pulse-pounding multiplayer survival game where speed and luck determine the victor. Dive into the chaos for an adrenaline-fueled showdown—only the fastest and luckiest will emerge victorious!

name: Running Through a Crypto Mine
summary: You are a possum with a large magnet in a crypto mine. You job is to destroy every server you see, while hiding from the crypto security.

name: Rubber Bandits: Animal Bandits
summary: What's the best disguise to go on a heist? Of course dressing up as (or literally being) a cute or wild animal! No one suspects a fluffy animal for a bandit.

name: Rune Worth 2: Jikuu no Shinsen
summary: Rune Worth 2: Jikuu no Shinsen is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by T&E Soft, which was released in Japan in 1991

name: Rune Worth 3: Shinseiki Kourin
summary: The third installment in the Rune Worth series.

name: Run Away From Me. Alexandra
summary: An action-packed adventure quest with horror elements about Alexandra, who fell into the clutches of a maniac. Your task is to escape from him, completing quests along the way. What ending will you have? Can you choose from the maniac's lair? And who is the real victim in this story?

name: Ruby's Land
summary: Delve into the mysteries of Ruby's Land as a reporter investigating the disappearance of the headmaster after a fire. Explore the park, solve puzzles and uncover the truth behind the disappearances of children. Use a special gadget to survive in this terrifying environment.

name: Rusty Dusty
summary: "Rusty Dusty es un juego 2D donde un robot de limpieza lucha por su libertad en un edificio residencial, enfrentando temas de clasismo. Los jugadores toman decisiones importantes que afectan el destino del protagonista."

name: Rug Cleaning Simulator
summary: Rug cleaning simulator is cozy, relaxing first person simulator about running small rug cleaning business. You start as a burned out person that leaves corporate job and open rug cleaning business.

name: Ruby Dreams: Immortal Promise
summary: As a maid in the elegance of a vampire household, use clues from your dreams to earn the love of your masters.

name: Run and Hunt: Skeleton Rebellion
summary: You are a brave traveler who got lost in a dark labyrinth, beware of the evil skeletons. The evil skeletons know where you are, and they are already hunting you. Can you defeat them?

name: Runaway Girl: Picked up a Girl
summary:
Living together with an obsessive lover runaway girl
A moving story begins──
You can find a runaway girl and change her life. An adventure to nurture bonds and overcome difficulties awaits. Her future is in your hands.
Let's take the hand of a runaway girl who is at a loss and open up a new path. Her destiny depends on your choices. Her emotional journey begins—your kindness and her courage will help her save her life.

name: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
summary: Like a lost NES release from 1993, Adventures in Gameland is a fully fleshed NES version of the new upcoming Rugrats game. This is included within the standard release and also as a standalone cartridge for your retro console.

name: Rust
summary: RUST is a 90s and Scythe-inspired project that aims to combine the early wad aesthetics of D!Zone style wads with the modern progression and fast-paced as wads like Scythe.

name: Ruins of the Unforgotten Souls
summary: Small medieval map for alkaline 1.2.2 with singleplayer, coop and deathmatch support.

name: Running Late
summary: Running Late is a five-level Boom-compatible PWAD created by A2Rob and released in January 2017. The PWAD is the author's go at building a small, continuous level set, that is built upon mostly vanilla Doom textures with some new graphics. The levels were designed around pistol start balance.

name: Rune Seeker
summary: Rune Seeker is a strategy card game with a turn-based format, developed to become a tactical universe.

name: RunieStory
summary: Befriend locals, romance a girl, or even go on an adventure for money for gifts! An action RPG inspired by Stardew Valley and Rune Factory where you befriend or romance townsfolk or go explore dungeons. There is a lot of things to do such as farming, cooking and hunting! The main goal is to get married and get to know everyone the exploring dungeons.

name: RuneStone Keeper & YourToy & Distrust Bundle
summary: Three great games in one pack! Survive in different situations!

name: Ruiga Pirates: Cursed Seas
summary: Defeat legions of pirates and marine beasts to emerge victorious in Ruiga Pirates: Cursed Seas! Adventure with survival elements. Customize your ship, prepare for barrages from myriad foes, and navigate the perilous waters of a monster realm. Embark on this thrilling journey and Play for Free now!

name: Ruler Battle Online
summary:
Flick, hit, smash—it's ruler battle!
Battle it out online with players from all over the world!

name: Rusty Flesh
