summary: Rusty Flesh is a sci-fi horror puzzle platformer for the Game Boy Color where you switch gravity instead of jumping. Explore the different areas of a derelict spaceship putting together all the pieces of its lovecraftian mistery, and enjoy its retro-futuristic aesthetics.

name: Rustwing
summary: Rustwing is a twin stick shooter rougelike, where you play as a mercenary spaceship sent on a journey across the habited space. Navigate from star to star, battle the scattered factions of humanity, customize your weaponry, acquire powerful upgrades and become a legendary pilot!

name: Ruby Rose: Ace Attorney
summary: Ruby Rose Ace Attorney is a crossover between the Ace Attorney video games and the RWBY web series.

name: Running Memories
summary: Running throgh a series of overlaying memories

name: Rubedo: The Occult Dawn
summary: Open-world RPG with turn-based combat. As the Last Alchemist, tasked to unleash forbidden chaos magic into the world, perform occult rituals, master ancient spells, and awaken spirits—vile or merciful. Evade the realm's harsh anti-witchcraft edicts and restore the tradition of mystery and magic.

name: Runeflame
summary: Runeflame is a point-and-click fantasy adventure with an open world and an emphasis on puzzle-solving. Guide your custom character through the immersive world of Runeflame, where secrets and magic have minds of their own.

name: Ruby's Vitten Party
summary:
A horror video-game featuring VTuber RubyWhiska's Birthday Party.

What begins as a seemingly pleasant visit to her house quickly descends into chaos, as guests must fight to survive the night or face being transformed into Vittens.

name: Run & Jump Guy
summary: Leap into "Run & Jump Guy," a pixel-packed platformer spanning three thrilling worlds: Island, Snowy Forest, and Castle. Overcome enemies and obstacles to conquer the ultimate boss!

name: Runecraft
summary: An endless labyrinth of runic puzzles.

name: Rune Stones
summary: Rune Stones - An exciting 3D logic puzzle! A mysterious and enigmatic island opens before you, filled with puzzles that you have to solve!

name: Rush Delivery
summary: Another Zombie Survivors

name: Runner
summary: A speedrunning platformer. Run, jump, and slide to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Rusty's Retirement: Supporter Pack
summary: If you are enjoying Rusty's Retirement and you want to support further development of the game (and future games) then the Supporter Pack is for you.

name: Run Forrest Run
summary: A side-scrolling Puzzle 'n' Run made for the Hanks Jam

name: Rust Rivalry
summary: A futuristic sci-fi first person shooter where combatants fight for the fate of their home.

name: Rubber Sharks
summary: Plunge into the tranquil existence of the sweet poolside life with the amazing company of peaceful Rubber Sharks. This adventure invites you to revel in the bliss of your cherished poolside sanctuary. But could there be a mystery hidden in this peaceful scene, or even more?

name: Run Run Boy 2
summary: "Run Run Boy 2" is an exciting and adrenaline-fueled game that puts your skills and reflexes to the test.

name: Runi's Math Castle
summary: Navigate the Math Castle solving addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and number matching to earn Gold Stars unlocking Characters and Mini-Games: 3 in a row Tic-tac-toe, Memory card match, timed jumping in Spire Run, and Dance Party patterns. Come play again to beat your high score!

name: Rushuzen
summary: Rushuzen is a turn-based roguelike focusing on gear and character power.

name: Rum N' Gold Royale
summary: Set sail in Rum N’ Gold, a naval Battle Royale action. With tactical combat, ship customization, and a relentless storm, every round is a thrilling adventure. Go solo or form a fleet with your friends and fight to be the last ship sailing!

name: Runner Bear
summary: Auto-running homebrew platform game for Atari 8-bit computers.

name: Rusts of Corruption
summary: You've mysteriously awoken on an isolated island on an unknown world. A corrupting force spreads through the island, leaving only a short amount of time to learn about the islands mysteries... Who will you meet? What will you learn? Are you ready to see the world die?

name: Run Tom Hanks Run
summary: It's a classic style 2D Platformer featuring 9 levels in 3 worlds! Take to Castaway Beach, Take to the trees in Vietnam! And Meet a Volcano!

name: Runnero
summary: Runnero is an exhilarating endless runner game set in tunnels where players must navigate obstacles, collect points, and seize special items that grant temporary invincibility, double scores, or time slowdowns. As player accumulate points, the pace quickens, intensifying the challenge. Dodge obstacles, gather points, and push your reflexes to the limit in this adrenaline-fueled adventure!

name: Run Away SkyDancer
summary: You have escaped the used car parking lot and must run away thru the town to freedom.

name: Run Mr. Robo!
summary: They kicked you out of the city and now you want REVENGE!! unlock costumes and kill all the mayor's henchmen in this fast top-down-shooter, but watch out! only 1 hit and you die (unless you equipped the shield of course)

name: Rubik's Match
summary: Spin, solve, and evolve in this match-3 game - fun twist on the classic.

name: Ruinas
summary: Duke has gotten lost and ended up in some unknown ruins plagued by aliens. Duke will have to manage to find his way out of the ruins.

name: Run Run My Bride!
summary: This is a parkour game where players need to control the bride and groom in a race, dodging vehicles and obstacles along the way, while collecting plenty of hearts.

name: Rusted Awakening
summary: A gothic horror shooter set in a rusted industrial nightmare. Inspired by John Romero, David Lynch, and Doom 64.

name: Run Higher
summary: Run Higher is an exciting running game where you run through levels, dodging falling objects and saving your best time. Use power-ups like life replenishment and power shield. Collect XP to unlock new levels and fun headgear.

name: Ruins of Endoth
summary: Third-Person ARPG set in a dark fantasy world. Fight enemies, collect random loot, level-up and explore the World of Endoth. Forge your destiny amongst it's heroes!

name: Ruzar: The Dark Stones
summary: Embark on a perilous journey in Ruzar - The Dark Stones, the sequel to Ruzar - The Life Stone. Explore mysterious realms and uncover the secrets of the Dark Stones, with enhanced gameplay testing your skills in treacherous dungeons.

name: Run The Words
summary: Ever read a book and found your eyes running across the letters and jumping over the spaces? You will after playing Run The Words.

name: Runet Legend
summary: To move further along the plot, you need to complete quests, look for various items that will help you get closer to the finale. Exciting adventures, secrets of the past and difficult decisions are waiting for you. Control the fate of Ozon671Games and help him figure out this difficult situation.

name: Run, Vivian Run
summary: Vivian starts running to change her fate――― A simple and rhythmic 2D side-scrolling action game. Match the correct actions to the music as you race through a collapsing fantasy world. Currently, only Stage 1 is available in this early access version.

name: Rumble Club: Founder's Pack - Silver
summary: The Rumble Club Founder's Pack - SILVER comes with the following:100 GemsSuper+ Rumble Pass, which includes the exclusive Float On Emote!Founder's Pack Exclusive Skin: Founding PunchieFounder's Pack Exclusive Accessory: Founder's Flow

summary: The Rumble Club Founder's Pack - BRONZE comes with the following:Super Rumble PassFounder's Pack Exclusive Skin: Founding Punchie

summary: 400 GemsSuper+ Rumble Pass, including exclusive Float On Emote!Founder's Pack Exclusive Skin: Founding PunchieFounder's Pack Exclusive Accessory: Founder's FlowFounder's Pack Exclusive Accessory: Quarter FounderFounder's Pack Exclusive Accessory: Founder Fries

name: Russian Random Speedmap Pack 3
summary: Russian Random Speedmapping Sessions is a speedmapping festival, where the goal was not a timer, but high-quality maps realized in a short time, the development of which would not go into endless construction. The result was 25 mappers have come together to create 64 maps with unique gameplay, ideas and experiments.

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis The Torment
summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Torment!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Raymer
summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Raymer!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Velora
summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Velora!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Zhurong
summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Zhurong!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Kidd
summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Kidd!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Neon Horizons Raymer
summary: Neon Raymer, the Future-Tech Bounty Hunter! With is top tech blaster he never misses his mark. Grab this skin to haul in top scoring bounty heads with style and grace.

summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Ashani!

summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Urdah!

summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Ezzie!

summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Afi & Galu!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Nemesis Seth
summary: Every hero has a dark side. Unlock an exclusive Nemesis-themed skin for Seth!

name: Ruin of the Fae Realm
summary: A weekend + a few days jam map made for the cohost mapping potluck mapjam with theme of 'flow'.

name: Rusty Junkyard Simulator
summary: Collect junk cars, dismantle them for parts, and restore them to their former glory. Experience the thrill of transforming rusty vehicles into valuable assets, selling them for profit, or racing your restored cars. Turn rust into riches and build your reputation as a top car restorer and racer!

name: Runes: Hidden Objects Puzzle Game
summary: Step into the enchanting realm of Enchanted Crossroads, a fantasy town bustling with a myriad of captivating creatures and hidden artifacts to be unraveled.

name: Ruthless Carnage Hotline
summary: Ruthless Carnage Hotline : Fight, Survive, Dominate! Are You Ready?

name: Ruin 2: Mimic Adventures
summary:
Taking place after the "Elevator Ending" of Ruin, Ruin 2: Mimic Adventures follows the journey of the Mimic trying to escape the Freddy Fazbear's Mega Pizzaplex!

Platform your way through the ruins of the Pizzaplex, go through familiar areas in a completely new way and take on old foes and other wacky shenanigans in this crazy quest for freedom!

name: Ruins of Pantheon
summary:
Octlien come the earth again so that they begin the final attack.
Please search for treasure that sleeps in ruins, and defend the earth.

name: Rules of Engagement: Book 1
summary: Rules of Engagement, Book 1 is the first book of the Rules of Engagement series. It is followed by Rules of Engagement, Book 2, Rules of Engagement, Book 3, and a spin-off, Rules of Engagement: Newlyweds.

name: Rules of Engagement: Book 2
summary: Rules of Engagement, Book 2 is the second book of the Rules of Engagement series. It succeeds its first book, Rules of Engagement, Book 1, and is followed by Rules of Engagement, Book 3, and a spin-off, Rules of Engagement: Newlyweds.

name: Rules of Engagement: Book 3
summary: Rules of Engagement, Book 3 is the third and final book of the Rules of Engagement series. It succeeds its first two books, Rules of Engagement, Book 1 & Rules of Engagement, Book 2, and is followed by a spin-off, Rules of Engagement: Newlyweds.

name: Rules of Engagement: Newlyweds
summary: Rules of Engagement: Newlyweds is a spin-off book of the Rules of Engagement series, taking place one year after the events of the series.

name: Ruined Vacation
summary: Ruined vacation is a wad composed of three (plus a credits map) action packed levels to kick some ass through

name: Rubber Head Bob
summary: It's a mountain climbing game with a rubber-headed human! The controls are incredibly challenging! Bounce around like crazy!

name: Run from the Feds!
summary: Third person 3D platformer with the goal being get to the end as fast as possible.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Gorbachev's Posters In The Apartment
summary: Posters of Soviet President Mikhail Gorbachev will appear in your apartment.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Personal Computer In The Apartment
summary: An old personal computer appears on a table in the character's apartment

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Instant Arrival In Novosibirsk
summary: This add-on allows you to instantly get to the main goal in the game - the train station in Novosibirsk.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Flashlight
summary: The add-on adds a regular flashlight with which you can find something interesting in the game

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Beer On The Train
summary: The add-on adds beer bottles, 3 pieces, to the passenger train car.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: People In A Train Car
summary: This add-on adds a girl and a guy to the passenger car of the train.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Posters In The Train Car
summary: This add-on adds a girl and a guy to the passenger car of the train.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: Fast Time
summary: Adds time acceleration to the game Russian Train Trip 2, to see all the content, all the train stations and not to spend 10 hours playing the game.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: VIP Seat In The Train Car
summary:
This DLC makes a real VIP seat out of your compartment car, which includes:

Various items on the table (pizza, soda, mug, etc.)
Posters
Headphones
Other items.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: A Beautiful Girl In Your Place
summary:
This DLC adds a girl companion to your compartment car.

The girl lies on top of your seat and is pleasing to the eye.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: Putin's Posters in the Train Car
summary:
This DLC adds Vladimir Putin posters to your compartment car.

The posters hang on two walls and always delight your eye, no matter where you sit.

name: Rule & Expand
summary: A 2x strategy game (exploit and expand). Rule regions to gain money and men. Build armies and expand your empire. Manage your regions carefully or they will rebel against you. Take care of your armies' morale or you will lose control of them.

name: Runaway Star
summary: Runaway Star is a classic turn-based RPG inspired by games like Pokemon Mystery Dungeon and Final Fantasy. Explore the world of Raffelsia where falling stars with dangerous monsters inside have begun to plague the region. Join a team of adventurers called the Diurners and work together with new friends to uncover the source of the phenomenon and bring a stop to it.

name: Run! Run! Lancer: Fate/Stay Night - Heaven's Feel
summary: For once, Saber is stepping aside as the franchise's star to let Lancer shine in an 8-bit styled side-scroller game called RUN!RUN! Lancer!

name: Runeborn
summary: Runeborn is a dark fantasy roguelike that merges deckbuilding with a slot-machine-like mechanic. Forge your runebook, crush enemies, and combine trinkets of boundless power to destroy the forces of Despair!

name: Runny Bunny
summary: Get ready for a fast and furry twist on puzzle action in side-scrolling pixel art platforming style!

name: Runeomicon
summary: Cast runes to summon the goddess of death, unleash eldritch horrors to fend off villagers, and wield dark magic in this unique tower defense. Balance your power between summoning and fortifying as waves of enemies close in. Can you complete the ritual before your defenses crumble?

name: Ruins of Dawnseeker
summary: Awaken to a world shrouded in mystery in this captivating JRPG dungeon crawler. Follow the intertwined fates of Feriza, Layla, and Yosephine as they navigate treacherous dungeons and face formidable foes, all while piecing together the fragments of their lost memories.

name: Rubido
summary: Rubido is a little chinese checkers or solitaire game with four difficulties.

name: Rusty the Rooster
summary: "Rusty the Rooster" is a captivating 2D pixel art platformer where players join Rusty, a brave rooster, on a heroic quest to rescue his girlfriend and unborn chicks. With its charming graphics and heartwarming storyline, this game offers an unforgettable adventure of courage and love.

name: Rules of War
summary: A simple 4X Turn-based military strategy game with missile warfare. Command troops, expand your borders, and launch missiles against your enemies. Balance expansion, technology, and diplomacy. Can you lead your nation to victory?

name: Rustyard
summary: Help the robot through the rustyard by interacting with the environment.

name: Run An Empire
summary:
A fun, free motivation to move further! Capture real world places and compete against neighbors with every step you take.

Whether walking to your workplace or running a marathon, capture the places you move through to build a formidable empire. Explore further to collect resources and earn great fortunes. Lead your people from the dawn of time to the Space Age.

“Don a pair of sneakers and run (jog, or walk) to victory” Engadget

name: Rusty Dudes
summary: Assemble a team to complete various missions, while fighting off hordes of freaks. In your will be available two dozen unique mercenaries with different skills. Combine them at your discretion.

name: Rugby Leage Live 2: Game of the Year Edition
summary:
Rugby Leage Live 2 is a rugby simulation game in which players compete against real-world teams in realistic matches. It features a number of different game modes, including a career mode, custom matches and online games. There is also a Fanhub program in which a user can create and edit teams, players and competitions.
The Game of the Year Edition includes 2013 Roster and Kits available via DLC code.

name: Run the Rings
summary: A PvP spaceship management auto battler! Build a custom spaceship layout and compete against other players. Play your way and be a bounty hunter, space pirate, or merchant trader.

name: Ruined Nurse
summary: Explore the hospital by Thwarting the creatures that are trying to stop you and solving puzzles. Successfully install the internet and surprise customer...

name: Runner Heroes: The Curse of Night and Day - Enhanced Edition
summary: Runner Heroes is a unique adventure in which you control two characters at the same time. Sprint your way through the mystical lands of Celuria, a war-torn land of magic, to break a wicked curse and reunite with your childhood sweetheart. Do you accept the challenge? Follow Colwyn and Lyssa, heirs of their respective kingdoms, as an evil Red Witch prevents their love from flourishing. Harness the magic of Celuria to fight her curse as she chases you across 5 challenging worlds! Escape her clutches by running, jumping, diving and riding mine cars across 47 levels.

name: Rugby League Team Manager 4
summary: The fourth instalment of “The Number 1 Rugby League Management Game”. The biggest leagues and competitions. Take full control of managing your own Rugby League club. Training schedules, coaches, physios, scouting, finances, sponsors and more. MUCH MORE!

name: Rule The Beach Volleyball
summary: Rule the Beach is a 3D sports simulation game that immerses players in the fast-paced and vibrant world of beach volleyball. Combining realistic visuals with intuitive controls, this game challenges players to master the art of serving, spiking, and volleying while competing in scenic beach settings. Its dynamic gameplay, enhanced by responsive physics, makes for a fun and engaging experience.

name: Rusty Road Racing
summary: A fun rally simulator focusing on car physics modeling, tire skidding, and suspension functionality! Full camera customization, recording, and sharing features! Incredible turns and jumps await drivers who are crazy enough!

name: Rule the Waves 3: Expanded Battles
summary: Prepare to return to the definitive naval warfare simulation game, Rule the Waves 3, with the new Expanded Battles expansion! Take your love and knowledge of 20th century naval warfare from the exciting campaigns of the base game and get ready to craft and fight the naval battles of your dreams.

name: RuneQuest: Warlords
summary: RuneQuest: Warlords is a battle-scale turn-based strategy game set in the Runequest universe. Immerse yourself in the rich lore of Glorantha. Become a warlord, master the use of runes and defend your tribe against the incursions of Chaos. Field an army drawing from heroes and creatures.

name: Runaway Home: Mili and Chocolate
summary: "Runaway Home: Mili and Chocolate" is a romance visual novel game. On your usual way home, you come across a runaway girl on the roadside. What follows is a heart-pounding cohabitation, and a gradual revelation of the girl's mysterious past.

name: Runes of Legend
summary: Runes of Legend is an immersive pixel adventure game set in a captivating fantasy world filled with mystery and magic. You can step into the role of a courageous adventurer tasked with exploring a once-peaceful land now threatened by the resurgence of dark forces.

name: Rubble Trouble Tokyo
summary: Carefully Demolish buildings with new tools in this Rubble Trouble Follow up!

name: Rubble Trouble Moscow
summary: Demolish using new tools and avoid hazards in winter wonderland, Moscow!

name: Rush
summary: Four player one button platform racing with gravity flipping dynamics!

name: Rusty Drill
summary: Rusty Drill is a 32 map community megawad which began development back in 2023 to celebrate Scythe turning 20. ﻿This project was a continuation of the Scythe themed community project "Scythe: Re-sharpened" by EPICALL.

name: Running Through Backrooms
summary: Welcome to Running Through Backrooms, an immersive horror experience that plunges you into the eerie and unsettling world of the Backrooms. Navigate through seemingly endless hallways and abandoned rooms. Each level presents a unique challenge, combining the thrill of parkour with the terror of the unknown.

name: Rust of Steel
summary: "Rust of Steel" is a post-apocalyptic ruins exploration RPG with a high degree of freedom. Take on the world in your own style with multiple scenarios, free stat distribution, and the option to play as the good guy or the bad guy!

name: Run! Run! Don't Die!
summary: Run Run is a short platform runner that features a speedrun-style timer and online high scores so that players can compare their best runs against each other. Run, jump, throw your hat/bounce on it, and avoid/defeat enemies as you race for the fastest time!

name: Rushmith
summary: Faster! More carefully! This is a mini-game in which you have to build as many weapons as possible within a limited time limit of 120 seconds, making full use of various skills.

name: Run Bird Run!
summary: Run! And Jump. Run Bird Run! is an infinite runner where you play as a bird, jumping over rocks. The game is designed to be more relaxing than intense. After jumping over a few rocks and finding your rhythm, you might just enter the flow state.

name: Run Pizza Run 2
summary: Online pizza delivery simulator! Deliver pizzas, compete with friends, and conquer a chaotic online world full of obstacles and unexpected challenges. New maps, modes, and tons of fun await you! Ready to become the best delivery driver? Embrace the chaos!

name: Rustic Defense
summary: Rustic Defense is a hexagonal fantasy tower defense game with roguelike elements, generated enviroment with option explore your own way. Research skills and cards, choose path, build towers and uprade them.

name: Rugrats Go Wild Wildlife Rescue
summary:
The Nickelodeon Wildlife Rescue games were a series of video games released by Nickelodeon throughout the early to mid 2000s. The concept of the series was that the player would act as a ranger working to rescue sick, endangered animals by bringing them to a compound and nursing them back to health by finding or buying them medicine, food, and water.

Rugrats Go Wild Wildlife Rescue was a flash game released in 2003 to promote the eponymous crossover film and took place in the South China Sea.

The was entirely lost, as they were removed from Nick.com circa 2011. Few screenshots can be found, and no gameplay footage seems to exist of either game. An archived version is also available, but due to the internet requirements, it is seemingly unplayable as is.

name: Rune Ark
summary: A dark fantasy RPG where Match-3 combat meets dungeon exploration. As a young squire, uncover ancient secrets, forge alliances, and battle eldritch horrors beneath the castle. Your choices shape the fate of the kingdom—will you rise as a hero or succumb to the darkness?

name: Ruff Day at the Office
summary: Another busy day at the office, and you’re one cute, cheeky dog! Spread chaos as you ascend to the top of this corporate world and turn it into your personal playground!

name: Runes of Mystery
summary: The Demon Lord. His cold-blooded minions roam the magical world, spreading fear and destruction. Draw them out of their hiding places, strip them of their power and restore peace.

name: Run-Sprint-Parkour!
summary: An action-adventure sports 3D platform survival game. Qualify to join thrilling running competitions, and unleash your unstoppable potential. Put on an unforgettable show and rise to riches—go from zero to hero!

name: Rush Ultimate
summary: Reach the flag, complete the race and DON'T TOUCH ANYTHING! 24 areas to dominate and enter your name in the global leaderboard!

name: Ruins of Tearyn
summary: Ruins of Tearyn is the smallest fantasy Indie MMO inspired by classic MMORPGs (but modernized!). There will be formidable warriors, epic healers, try-hard DPS and mesmerizing enchanters.

name: Rules & Rodents
summary: A puzzling adventure where you abuse the rules set by your rat captors. Manipulate enemies and environments with the commanding power of rules to escape.

name: RuneScape: Dragonwilds
summary: On RuneScape’s forgotten continent of Ashenfall, dragons have awoken. Gather, build, skill and craft to survive in this co-operative (1-4) survival crafting game. Only by mastering survival and uncovering ancient secrets can they hope to slay the Dragon Queen—alone or with allies.

name: Ruby Journey
summary: You debark in a hamlet with only one gold in pocket, and you want to get the locals' ruby. Get resources, do quests, unlock trading opportunities to enrich, all while discovering their lore.

name: Rufus Snackdown
summary: Rufus Snackdown is a game from the Disney.com webring. Players control Rufus as he eats corndogs while avoiding freeze-drying robots.

name: Rufus Snow Ride
summary: Rufus Snow Ride is a game from the Disney.com webring. Players control Rufus as he attempts to ski down a mountain.

name: Run Salmon Run
summary: During Alaskan summers, salmon can be found swimming upstream rivers during spawning season. You are one such salmon. Can you make it to the top of the river in one piece?

name: Run! Goddess
summary: A F2P mobile gacha wave shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world where scantily clad heroines fend off hordes of zombies and mutants.

name: RuinsStory
summary: A high-speed action shooter that allows you to move at high speed and aim at the floor, wall, and ceiling. Combine various items to create your own build.

name: RuPaul's Drag Race Match Queen
summary: Welcome to the fabulous world of "RuPaul's Drag Race Match Queen," where charisma, uniqueness, nerve, and talent combine in a fierce new puzzle challenge game! Match drag queens, master challenges, and sashay your way to the top!

name: Runeflame: Legacy of the Druids
summary: As you journey through this fell swamp and uncover terrible ancient secrets, you may stumble across other lost souls in need - do you dare to help?

name: Rusty Coffin
summary: A co-op game about exploring dangerous planets with your teammates, collecting and selling scrap metal to survive from the corporation. Assemble your own robot to help your team in your own way. Never be a “rusty coffin”.

name: Rush Heroes
summary: The cat kingdom is in danger. You can use golds that automatically gather to assemble your various 4 typed soldiers. Or use game-changing heroes' skills to win. Collecting equipments to assist in these battles, strengthen the heroes and ultimately reclaim the future of the cat kingdom.

name: Rugby Tycoon Rugby Rovigo Delta
summary: An immersive and strategic game experience focused on the management of a rugby club.The game combines tactical decisions with the management of the team, financial planning and competition in a world of rugby.

name: Rubbish
summary: Welcome to this garbage treasure trove, a strategy game where you combine these garbage in the most reasonable way you think, and there will always be unexpected rewards! Mysterious and brand new fun awaits you!

name: Russian Cat Simulator
summary: Russian Cat Simulator is a meditative game that allows the player to take a look at the life of a cat and the surrounding world in realistic graphics. In this calm and meditative game, exciting adventures and the opportunity to feel like a real cat await you. In the game you will have to perform various tasks and errands: catch all the mice, steal the catch from the fisherman and much more! Sound accompaniment will add coziness and tranquility, making the gameplay even more enjoyable.

name: Rusted
summary: Rusted is a Linear horror game. You wake up after coma, but something isn't right. Everything is worn down and there's rust everywhere. How long have you been out for? Figure out what happen and find your way out. But be careful, you're not alone.

name: Rust Onslaught
summary: Rust Onslaught is a top-down shooter where you play as the robot R-75, as he takes out everything he sees. Humanity Is Dead, Robots Own The Earth, and you have become a danger.

name: Runa Illustra
summary: A puzzle game about spellcasting, where you can cast spells by drawing magic circles.

name: Run Before He Knows
summary:
You're seven years old, and your parents are away for the night. Since you can't stay home alone, they ask a family friend - someone you've never met - to watch over you. It was supposed to be a quiet evening, nothing more. But as the night goes on, something starts to feel wrong.

Can you find a way to call for help before it’s too late?

name: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Super Digital Deluxe Edition
Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Digital Deluxe Edition
Running Out
summary: In this fast-paced platformer, every run is a race against time. Push your limits, speed through levels, and go further with upgrades that keep you in the game. Sharpen your skills, optimize your runs, and reach the finish before it's too late. Fast, intense, and addictive, can you beat the clock?

name: RunStickRun!
summary: Stick runs and runs and runs and just can't stop. Touch to make him jump from platform to platform so that he doesn't crash into the ground. How far can YOU get before you fall?

name: Rubik's Cube
summary:
Play anywhere, anytime on the most authentic digital representation of the Rubiks Cube available. Flick, spin, and solve the classic 3x3x3 Rubiks Cube just like you would the real cube!

Tired of playing with the classic cube? There are 5 new themed cubes to try! Play with the natural Wooden Cube, challenge yourself with the difficult Icon Cube, and discover the intriguing Mystery Cube.

name: Rule the Kingdom
summary: An epic RPG adventure awaits you in Rule the Kingdom! Outfit your character, train your loyal band of warriors and join the battle against trolls, skeletons and other baddies to save the empire from evil! Build homes for your workers, produce goods in your workshops, fortify your stronghold, and farm crops to feed your subjects in your quest to build a thriving kingdom!

name: Russian Roulette
summary: Famous gambling game with a revolver "Russian Roulette". This is the most extreme and dangerous gambling. Check which side luck is on.

name: Rumbly
summary: Rumbly is a fast-paced turn-based roguelike battle game that focuses on speed and accuracy!!

name: Rumbral
summary: Rumbral is a dark, puzzle platformer set in a seemingly forgotten world. Find your way in this desolated place while trying to recover your memories and find out who you really are.

name: Run Jump Climb Disarm
summary: Run, jump, and climb your way through 20 uniquely themed levels and disarm all bombs before time runs out.

name: Run Bird Run
summary: Touch the left or right side of the screen to move your bird and avoid the falling boxes! Collect candies and unlock new birds.

name: Russian Survivors
summary: Fight versus unlimited hordes of lizards and italian brainrot animals in post-soviet environment.

name: Run and Gun 2: Opossum City
summary: Open world, up to 8 player coop multiplayer, third person, zombie shooter, procedural generation, multiple locations, drivable cars, and oh yeah, flyable helicopters with mini guns. Escape the infested Opossum City streets and uncover dark secrets within Alex Manor in this nostalgic zombie shooter.

name: Ruyn HD
summary: Ruyn HD is a remake of my minimalist boomer shooter Ruyn, rebuilt in Unreal Engine 5. It keeps the fast, combo-driven gameplay of the original, but now features modern visuals, smoother controls, updated audio, and tighter gunplay. Ruyn Classic and the 2D and 3D level editors are included.

name: Rushing Beat X: Return of Brawl Brothers
summary: The legendary beat ’em up series from Jaleco returns. Master trained fighters take on a rising evil with raw strength and refined technique. Built around easy-to-use auto-combos, the game lets skilled players weave powerful strings for exhilarating combat. Let your fists burn with fury once more.

name: Rune Dice
summary: Throw dice, create explosive chain reactions, and defeat waves of enemies in Rune Dice! Collect ancient runes with diverse abilities, add synergies between relics, heroes, and special dice. All combined, this will give you an excellent experience in our roguelike deckbuilder.

name: Rumble Burst
summary: Smash your limits. The infinite chain-reaction battle begins! Blast away waves of enemies in this exhilarating hack & smash action! Chain your attacks, unleash unstoppable combos, and dive into wave-based survival with randomized skill builds and ever-changing strategies!

name: Run Quad Run
summary: Run Quad Run is a top-down skill based parkour game where you escape from the evil shapes to recover the lost artifacts of Cubicland. Navigate through various worlds with different enemies and master your reflex skills in the world of cubes.

name: Rusty Foodies
summary: Rusty Foodies is a puzzle game where you must strategically place various food blocks according to specific rules to achieve the target score. As you progress through the stages, you'll face an increasing number of obstacles, making placement more challenging.

name: Rust and Patina
summary: A story about transience and acknowledging needs

name: Runes of the Abyss
summary: A turn-based roguelike with JRPG-style combat where the heroes are the reason the world is dying — and they don’t even realize it.

name: RustNaut
summary: A bullet hell game where you battle against relentless robots, covered in rust. Escape the chaos and make it home.

name: Runway 66
summary: A mind trapped in a looping simulation. A black box holding the truth. Experience psychological horror where your voice bends reality and memories lie.

name: Rules of Nature
summary: An open-world post-apocalyptic survival game set during a zombie outbreak. As one of the few survivors, you must explore towns to scavenge supplies, remain vigilant against zombie attacks, recruit fellow survivors, and build your survivor base. Stay alive!

name: Run Chicken Run
summary: “Run Chicken Run” is an online co-op action and simple entertainment game.In the game you and your allies have to chase the chicken to catch the one that escaped from the table. You have to get the chicken to the restaurant and deliver it to the cook before it escapes from the garden.

name: Rumble Crumble
summary: Dig, zoom, crush, blast, burn and CRUMBLE your way to the top in this cute arcade digger. Build your score to unlock new items and power-ups, discover new depths and expand Rumble’s journey to the surface. With charming graphics, classic arcade-style gameplay and a delightful soundtrack.

name: Ruya: Ascension
summary:
Ruya: Ascension is a meditative puzzle game and sequel to the original award-winning game.
Caught in a time loop, Ruya visits different universes freeing lost souls by giving parts of herself away in order to attempt to unlock her past memories.
Ruya: Ascension presents a brand-new adventure set in a surreal plane of existence, featuring numerous new puzzles that build upon the experience of the original hit game.

name: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Sakuna DLC
summary: Invite Princess Sakuna and Tama from Sakuna: Of Rice of Ruin to the lands of Azuma with this free DLC!

name: Rumor Raiders
summary: Solve riddles, arrange residents to build a town, and use your raiders to push-your-luck through lethal dungeons in a puzzle strategy game inspired by various tabletop games.

name: Rumour
summary: Curiosity can bring darkness. Rumours of an alternate world bring two brothers to an university, where a mysterious lens will make them part ways. Clinging to the hope of finding your brother, embody Bichito and fight what observes in the dark.

name: Rusty Heights
summary:
You play as the last functional robot of your kind. Equipped only with your grappling hook, you will have to overcome the obstacles of a dying world and reach the summit. Remember : The higher you go, the greater the fall !

Rusty Heights is an experimental 2D platformer meant for hardcore players and speedrunners. It is playable with the mouse only and is made of a single very high level to be climbed without ever falling down. Get ready for a very challenging experience and great replayability thanks to the world leaderboard and the shareable ghost demo files !

Be brave little robot ! Every fall will only make you stronger !

name: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Rune Factory 4 Bachelorette Outfit Bundle
summary: Fashion meets nostalgia as a new trend sweeps through Azuma, bringing a touch of Selphia's iconic charm to its shores!

name: Rust: Instruments Pack
summary:
Reveal your inner musician in the Instrument Pack for Rust - a collection of 10 new musical instruments!

Lay down a beat with the Drum Kit, belt out a tune on the Piano and become popular with your friends with the Cowbell! These new instruments use a new range of notes letting you play a variety of music. Announce your presence while raiding with a trumpet or entertain your team with the new Jerry Can Guitar on long boat rides.

Got a MIDI compatible keyboard or device? You can take your musical skills to the next level by plugging it in and playing the in-game instruments. Impress your friends!

name: Run Sausage Run!: Cop, Crime and Crazy
Run Sausage Run!: Old, Ancient and Fossil
Run Sausage Run!: Honey, Light and Poison
Run Sausage Run!: Good, Bad and Curious
Run Sausage Run!: Fish, Plant and Hunt
Run Sausage Run!: Eyes, Brains and Bones
Russian Parkour Simulator
summary: A game where you need to find memes, clear apartment and other activities.

name: Rugby League 26
summary:
Step onto the pitch in the most authentic Rugby League experience ever!

Whether you're chasing club glory, building a custom ‘Pro Team’, or rising through the ranks with a self-made superstar, Rugby League 26 puts YOU at the heart of the action.

name: Run for Gold
summary: Qualify for your chance to win the ultimate athletic prize - a gold medal.

name: Rubber Duck Race Simulator
summary: Get your duck ready for the ultimate race!

name: Runaway Mole
summary: A simple platformer in which you navigate underground tunnels as a mole to reach the garden above. Along the way you'll have to dodge pesticide pools, stalagmites, and stalactites. Jump on bouncy mushrooms to help you reach new heights, and eat some bugs, just for fun.

name: Run4Ever
summary: Four endless runner levels in one game! Run and see how high of a score you can get!

name: Rune Dungeon
summary: Rune Dungeon is a strategy game blending auto-battler and roguelike elements. Recruit heroes, collect equipment, and activate runes to build powerful synergies. Face new challenges each run—form your team wisely and battle to the dungeon’s depths.

name: Ruling Horsestown
summary: Be a horse mayor and survive your term (somehow)! Make ridiculous and wildly unexpected choices, and deal with chaotic new situations every run as you try to keep your government (and the city) from total disaster!

name: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
summary: Dash into the enchanting world of Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer and embark on a holly jolly quest to save Christmas in this magical adventure inspired by the beloved 1964 animated classic!

name: Runeblight
summary: Runeblight is a retro, souls-like FPS set in a dying kingdom. As an eternal curse eats away at those who remain, an unlikely gift allows you to break the shackles of fate. Find secrets and hidden paths as you explore an interconnected world, tearing through cultists and monsters along the way.

name: Run, Veggies!
summary: Three unlikely heroes— a fiery tomato, a clever ear of corn, and a strong cabbage — must combine their unique skills to escape a dangerous food processing plant! Leap, swing, and smash through puzzles, hazards, and hidden threats before they end up on the plate. It’s time to Escape the Plate!

name: Rust Mobile
summary: Rust Mobile brings the core DNA of the Rust experience to mobile players: open-world survival, brutal PvP, base building, and sandbox gameplay.

name: Runic Prophecy
summary: Runic Prophecy is a challenging third-person soulslike action RPG set in a dark fantasy world. Explore Eyjusheim, unleash magic and a dragon in combat, battle supernatural creatures, and uncover the hidden lore of a shattered world.

name: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Super Digital Deluxe DLC Set
summary:
This premium set contains the following items:
Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Seasons of Love Bundle
Pilika's Bonding Stories
Cuilang's Bonding Stories
Marvelous Swimsuit Bundle (a swimsuit costume for each protagonist and romance candidate)
Festive Attire - Subaru
Festive Attire - Kaguya
Dark Woolby Costume
Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma Digital Soundtrack and Digital Art Book

name: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Digital Deluxe DLC Set
summary:
This set contains the following items:
Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Seasons of Love Bundle
Pilika's Bonding Stories
Cuilang's Bonding Stories
Marvelous Swimsuit Bundle (a swimsuit costume for each protagonist and romance candidate)
Festive Attire - Subaru
Festive Attire - Kaguya
Dark Woolby Costume

name: Rumble Rush
summary: Rumble Rush is a fast-paced, multiplayer action-racer where chaos meets competition. Players race through unpredictable obstacle-packed arenas, collecting power-ups, avoiding traps, and outsmarting rivals in quick, high-energy rounds. With tight controls, creative level design, and a focus on fun, Rumble Rush delivers nonstop thrills whether you're playing solo or with friends.

name: Run from Bubol Horror
summary:
Something is wrong. Your thoughts are hazy, your memory shattered — but one thing is clear: you’re being hunted. The presence drawn to your fear.

You don’t know how it started. You don’t know what it wants. But it won’t stop.

It watches. It waits. And then… it strikes.

There’s no time to think — only time to run. Find a way to survive the impossible.
Every second counts. Every sound could be your last.

name: Ruby and the Lost Crystals
summary: Ruby and the Lost Crystals is a calm third-person puzzle adventure where you swap between two characters to solve puzzles. Use physical interactions, magical projectiles, and object-swapping to unlock paths, reflect lasers, activate platforms, break obstacles, and explore ancient ruins.

name: Ruby’s Realms
summary: Explore hand-built levels packed with puzzles and perils. Leap platforms, blast enemies with magic flames, and discover secrets. Each realm brings fresh challenges. Green swamps ooze with toxic sludge. Orange factories rumble with crushers and blades. Blue depths demand swimming through hidden caves. Pink alien zones twist with bizarre life.

name: Runimals
summary: One chicken, many wolves. You’re not the hunter — you’re the snack. Runimals is a chaotic 3D endless runner where you dash, dodge, and devour to stay alive. How long can you survive the food chain?

name: Rust Moon
summary: In a cyberpunk wasteland, play as a rogue Peacekeeper captain—explore Metroidvania-style worlds and rewrite humanity’s fate through gunfire and choice.

name: Rule34dle
summary: A guessing game in which players aim to guess which character or tag has a higher number of posts submitted to the Rule 34 website. Correct answers will allow players to maintain a streak and attempt to reach a high score.

name: Run Chicken Run
summary: An arcade action game where you control a fleeing chicken, dodging traps, jumping over obstacles, and trying to survive as long as possible. Simple, fast-paced, and addictive — now with a global leaderboard to test your best escape times!

name: Ruffnauts: Planet Pals
summary:
Get ready to catch chaos in Ruffnauts: Planet Pals — the ultimate pet collecting, loot-grabbing, gadget-blasting VR sandbox game. Explore strange planets, blast enemies with ridiculous gadgets, and battle bizarre monsters alongside your pet squad.

Play solo or with friends in constantly evolving biomes. With weekly updates, there's always something wild (and probably explosive) around the corner.

name: RunPunk: The Parkour Game
summary: This is an open-world parkour game with an emphasis on atmosphere. The player can overcome any obstacles he encounters. The game takes place in Tokyo in the future. In the future, as the game develops, it is planned to add other cities and game mechanics.

name: Rube-like Gold-berger
summary: For tinkerers and contraption builders. Build wacky contraptions to launch enemies, zap parts across the screen, and create unlimited power.

name: Rumination
summary: Escape the loop of negative thoughts.

name: Run It Back
summary: Going nowhere has never felt so familiar.

name: Ruins of The Titan
summary: A 2D Rougelike action game with pixel art style. You are a summoned "hero", in exhilarating combat, smooth action and dazzling combo, defeat and execute enemies. Build from 100+ skills! Blending adventure, action, and strategic builds, the journey offers endless possibilities in every fight.

name: Rusty's Adventure
summary: Meet Rusty, a goofy but shy alien, and help him find his way back home in Rusty's Adventure!

name: Ruins Of Fear
summary: Lucian wakes up on an ordinary school day to find himself in a deserted world. Together with Elora, he must solve puzzles, evade creatures in dark corridors, and uncover the mysteries around him.

name: Rust Runners
summary: Post-apocalyptic driving, shooting & exploration. Customize 16 vehicles with guns, upgrades and armor. Use tools like the grapple winche and oil slicks to outmaneuver rivals. Battle 5 bosses, and level up your driver. Experience the ultimate blend of combat and exploration with a hint of nostalgia.

name: Runebound Bastion
summary: Each crystal can be upgraded to attack faster and deal more damage, helping you hold back stronger waves of enemies.

name: Runai
summary: ‘Runai’ is a cute pixel art sandbox game for casual players. Team up with various animal companions to build a village and explore unknown planets.

name: Ruinscape
summary: Dive into the mysteries of an abandoned castle, explore its ruins, and uncover treasures that reveal stories of the past. Serene medieval music sets the tone for a timeless journey through the ages.

name: Run From the Hunt
summary: An Horror Clicker Game, where you have to click to run from the hunt.

name: Ruled by Rule
summary: Dive into the depraved world of Ruled by Rule, an engaging RPG where the stakes are high and the consequences are… stimulating. This isn't your typical hero's journey; here, villains hold the power, and the Public Order Princesses are at their mercy. Prepare for intense combat, strategic decision-making, and a unique erotic specialization that sets this game apart.

name: Ruarua.ru
summary: Ruarua.ru is a long-term farming project that always accompanies you... It is a simple farming game that can be played anytime and anywhere when you have free time.

name: Rush The Towers
summary: Will you break through enemy defenses, or watch your forces fall before the towers?

name: Rudeirer.wtf
summary: A collection containing a variety of mostly fun, sometimes multiplayer minigames

name: Runway
summary: Dress up, kick the models off the runway, strike a pose, and be fabulous!~ Runway is an arcade-style kick-them-out 3d action game

name: Running VoltGun
summary: Blast through three stages defeating enemies and bosses as you go. Be careful though as your battery meter continually keeps losing power. You can toggle through two power modes, (low and high) to help crush the enemy. Collect pick ups, avoid traps and blast your way through victory!

name: Ruin: Beast City
summary: Assassinate your targets with style, as you uncover a plot of world domination and ancient horrors in this boss fight action game. Dive deep into the dark ruins of the Beast City, where only lunatic killers remain.

name: Runaway Cheater
summary: You just got caught by the husband of the girl you were cheating with! Run away, cheater!!

name: Rummy
summary:
Play the CLASSIC Rummy card game on your mobile device!

How to win is simple: play all your cards before your opponents!

But victory is both challenging and rewarding against opponents with adaptive skill levels. Precision, strategy and quick thinking are needed to master the game. Lay off your cards and play your sets and runs to win the game! We’ve also included clear tutorials to help you learn the game of Rummy at your own pace. Relax and train your brain as you compete in the game of Rummy!

name: Rust & Roots
summary: The machine island was supposed to be a technological utopia on the bleeding edge of technology. Now it's a slaughterhouse. You are the only thing standing between rampaging AI and the rest of humanity. Fight for a chance to survive in a top-down classical shooter and defy the machine!

name: Run Eternal Depths
summary: Can you escape? Explore ever-changing dungeons, face dangerous enemies, and challenge a powerful boss. With each floor, the trials grow harder, and the foes become stronger. Test your skills and prove that you are the one who can triumph and earn your freedom!

name: Russian Test
summary: Russian Test is simple test about some specific russian culture in some places

name: Rusty Winter
summary: Rusty Winter is a sidescrolling adventure game inspired by hardboiled detective stories and urban legends. Meet a diverse cast, chase down leads that blur the boundaries between reality and the paranormal, and explore a cold, once-glorious industrial town in search of your missing loved one.

name: Runaway Princess
summary: Once upon a time, there was a normal country with normal peace. But these days, the forces of the demon lord came out of nowhere, and is causing trouble. So the king plans to make his own daughter marry with the descendant of a proper, and noble hero in order to boost the spirits of citizens.

name: Run Chicken, Run!
summary: Run away like a chicken as fast as you can!

name: Ruiga Pirates: First Survivors
summary: Defeat legions of pirates and marine beasts to emerge victorious! Ruiga Pirates: First Survivors is an adventure with survival elements. Customize your ship, brace yourself for a bullets from myriad foes! Navigate the perilous waters of a ghost-infested realm and Play for Free now!

name: Ruindrift
summary: Ruindrift is a fast-paced, real-time RPG built around tight, skill-based combat. It replaces constant movement with deliberate timing and execution so every encounter rewards precision and mastery. Choose your class, craft unique builds, and face challenging enemies across worlds in ruin.

name: Runner Frog
summary: Runner Frog is a challenging 2D platformer with a speedrun style. Face 50 trap-filled levels, collect apples, and prove your skill racing against time. Every death is a chance to improve!

name: Rules of Engagement: The Grey State
summary: A new gold rush has begun. In this Tactical RPG Shooter, you are a Strider, an elite operative sent into the Grey State to retrieve priceless artifacts. Craft your own build, survive nightmarish creatures and rival squads, and get paid. This isn't about saving the world. It's just business.

name: Rubble Eats the World
summary: A high energy, physics driven shooter where everything can be destroyed and consumed. Fight angry bots to gain size and abilities. Grow from a tiny pebble to a mountain of a force and you just might EAT THE WORLD! Then build and share your own worlds with the sandbox level editor!

name: Ruina
summary: Match radiant gems, empower scrolls, and wield enchanted tools in this rogue-lite match-3 game. Customize your bag, purchase relics and charms, and choose boons to shape each run. Every match is a step toward mastery!

name: Rust Rides
summary: Roads that remember time. Cars with soul. Travel through Ukrainian steppes and villages — survive, race, trade, create. In the world of Rust Rides, there is no script — only you, the road, and a choice that changes everything.

name: Rush Roulette
summary: A village trapped in fear and snow. Leap and climb across rooftops to avoid danger. When the curse shifts, choose a powerful ability card to turn the tide. Avoid the monster and collect three relics to escape in this intense asymmetric multiplayer battle.

name: Runic Tower
summary: Stand as the last guardian of the god-bound Runic Tower in a groundbreaking 3rd-person roguelike tower defense experience. Command evolving powers, confront relentless invading factions, and utilize strategic planning to overcome your foes!

name: Rustmire
summary: In this side-view pixel-art world, you captain a landship—survive by combat and scavenging, and grow your modular vessel into your own city. Among roaming cities and underground enclaves, records and wreckage hint at why people live this way… or how you become wreckage.

name: Running Fable Petite Party
summary: Running Fable Petite Party throws you and your friends into 16 fast-paced, friendship-testing mini-games across 3 tabletop arenas. Outsmart, outplay, and out laugh each other in this ultimate party showdown for 1–4 players!

name: Rush N Crash
summary: Get ready for chaos with different modes that pull you into the action! Rush N Crash throws you into a world where humans and zombies clash in epic races. Hit the gas, and fight for victory!

name: Runix: Pinball Roguelike
summary: A roguelike 3D pinball game where you build your ball deck to hit and slay monsters with incredible combos and climb to the top of the leaderboard. Discover powerful artifacts that create incredible synergies and increase your mage powers to restore "The Pinball Order"

name: Rush: Apex Edition
summary: RUSH: Apex Edition is a VR wingsuiting game where players dive from mountain peaks and race through canyons at high speed. Featuring remastered visuals, dynamic weather, and over 90 tracks, it offers both solo play and 12-player online races with global leaderboards and proximity chat. The game delivers an immersive, fast-paced flight experience enhanced by haptic feedback and high frame rates on PS5.

name: Ruin and Rebirth
summary: Ruin and Rebirth is a fantasy open-world factory building game with creature taming and breeding. In this playable creation myth, bring life back to a surreal, shattered, post-divine apocalyptic world where the gods have died.

name: Run Sausage Run!: Hella Weenies Edition
Runewood: Hundred Nights
summary: Autobattler, roguelike survival card game taking place in the depths of a Sylvanian forest. You’re the legend, who is told to survive through the hundreds nights in the wild Runewood. … Or was it you? Trade, cast spells, equip legendary artifacts and adapt to the randomized runs!

name: Rune Legacy Idle
summary: Rune Legacy Idle is a multiplayer fantasy game featuring idle mechanics. Battle mythical monsters, train various skills, and team up or challenge your friends to duels. Enjoy a never ending idle RPG experience.

name: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Story of Seasons Bundle
summary:
Animals from the Story of Seasons series will find their way to the land of Azuma!
You can also take on quests to obtain new recipes for things like houses and decorations.

name: Rumours of a Roman Empire
summary: In this alternate-universe visual novel and dating sim, play as Julia or Julius Caesar and navigate the intrigue of the Late Roman Republic. Flirt, scheme, and outwit Rome’s elite to shape history—and forge an empire of your own.

name: Rubbish Island
summary: In Rubish Island, pilot the Ferrum-1 robot to restore a polluted archipelago. Clean debris to revive wildlife and vegetation, recycle waste into upgrades, and equip special tools for faster cleanup.

name: Rush Minutes: Online Shooter
summary: Rush Minutes — A fun and lively multiplayer shooter! Fast-paced action, surprises everywhere! Customize a wild character, grab wacky weapons, and go crazy with your friends!

name: Rulers of Cospaia
summary: Rulers of Cospaia is a digital board game of medieval strategy where you build your realm on a hexagonal board, gather resources, expand your city, and choose your path to victory — through economy, strength, or sabotage.

name: Runes: Lost In Time
summary: Runes: Lost In Time is a cinematic action-adventure where a lone traveler follows an ancient manuscript into forgotten ruins. Along the way, he decode lost languages, solve ancient mechanisms, and uncover a world hidden beneath myth.

name: Run from Duck
summary:
You woke up in water-soaked maze with no memory of how you got there.
Each step along the corridors, pressed by the walls, turned escape into an impossibility.
Panic becomes instinct. Running becomes survival.
There is no time to think, no place to rest, no guarantee the next corner won’t be the last.
Now there’s only one rule:
Run fast. Don’t look back.
And whatever you do — don’t let the Duck catch you.

name: Rugged Rovers
summary: Design and test your own all-terrain space rover! Race against rivals (including friends!) as you jump gaping canyons and cross treacherous boulder fields. Go as far as you can and try to be the top rover!

name: Ruadine
summary: Ruadine' is a single player dungeon-crawling adventure with a unique combat system. The game features a branching world to explore, mysterious monsters to defeat, and an atmospheric soundtrack.

name: Rushcremental
summary: Rushcremental is an active incremental journey about searching the wasteland for scrap resources and building a racecar to rule over all the territories.

name: Rushline
summary: Drift, blast, and power your way to the lead! Combine high speed racing with tactical combat in stylized nature themed tracks. Hoard power-ups, shield against attacks, and dominate the pack in online multiplayer.

name: Run Giraffe Run
summary: Run Giraffe Run is a multiplayer fast-paced giraffe racing 2D platformer. Poop bombs. Spit banana peels. Slip on banana peels. Race against friends through chaotic and colorful levels. Have you tried farting?

name: Ruins of Araethia
summary: An open-world game set in a post-apocalyptic medieval fantasy world. Learn to survive, fight off threats, and thrive in a harsh world.

name: Rune Gunner
summary: Rune Gunner is a Co-op Roguelite Shooter. Team up with friends, grab a gun, and embrace the magic of your enemies to hold back the mysterious forces threatening your world.

name: Runeveil
summary:
Runeveil is a roguelike deckbuilder where your strategy isn't just about what you play, but how you sequence it. Step into the shoes of powerful 7 Elemental Mages and travel through various Arenas. Your goal: Complete the 7 Kings' Trials of the 7 Unique Arena, and survive the escalating chaos.

Unlike traditional card games, where you play one card at a time, in Runeveil, you are the architect of your own turn.

name: Runtalis
summary: Runtalis is a 1–5 player turn-based tactical RPG. Coordinate your party, socket powerful Runes, and push your Magic Key against enemies with dangerous affixes. Higher risks unlock greater power in this grid-based, tabletop-inspired challenge. Master your skills or lose your Runes.

name: RunGx
summary: RunGX is a platformer-like shooter game inspired by Super Haste.

name: Run Coffee Run
summary: A fast-paced FPS platformer where staying awake is the challenge. Unlock movement upgrades, explore a compact island, drink coffee to delay sleep, and find the fastest path to escape before you collapse. Also features a corporate office tower full of dogs.

name: Rudravati: Curse of Bhankilla
summary: A first-person supernatural horror inspired by the legends of Bhangarh Fort. Explore India’s most haunted place, uncover your brother’s disappearance, and survive the ancient curse that still haunts the ruins.

name: Runeth
summary: A Voxel-style RPG sandbox game

name: Runic Winds
summary: Runic Winds is a top-down action RPG about mastering rune magic through deliberate combat, exploration, and atmospheric dungeon crawling.

name: Run from Blablublas horror
summary: Don’t stop. Don’t look back.

name: Run for Money: Hunter vs. Runner! Which Side Will You Win With!?
summary: The super popular "Run for Money" game is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 ! Experience your very own "Run for Money"!!

name: Running Horror
summary: A first-person horror game where you must explore a vast labyrinth, evade a relentless demonic Beast, and find trapped survivors to reverse a miscast spell and escape.

name: Rummix
summary: Rummix is a fast, minimalist puzzle game inspired by Rummy. Slide rows and columns to create matches of equal numbers or consecutive sequences. Every move counts—fail to make a match in time and the run ends. Plan smart, chase high scores, and master the pressure.

name: Run Up
summary: Run Up: Arcade Challenge is a thrilling 2D arcade platformer with runner elements. Dash through vibrant levels, dodging monsters and traps. Choose champions with unique stats like Strength and Luck, collect coins, and use abilities. Simple one-touch controls make it easy to play but hard to master as you aim for the global leaderboards!
